story:
Short Summary

As I wrote in the Overview, I have been an enthusiast of this artist for many years, and this opportunity came up VERY suddenly.  I'm a full-time student and I seriously JUST relocated my home residence and am totally tapped out:

  • His style is very much not only in line with mine, it's one of my main inspirations.
  • It's important to my current career goals; I have my 5th audition with "The Voice" in Dallas, TX at the end of June.
  • The magnitude of what I will achieve in this will be realized in the album I'm working on and in live performances that are ongoing.  Album is due in 2020.
  • This is SERIOUSLY a life dream.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need $1650 for these 5 days of classes.  I will get one on one direction with Gino and walk away with a completed piano track designed specifically and solely for me and played by Gino.
  • Anyone who contributes will get a digital copy of this track!
  • If the entire goal is not reached the funds will go toward the album project.

The Impact

Previous projects have been successful as with the first Indiegogo project allowed "No Father" to be created - the lead off single from "Worth The Wait", achieving a #6 Chart Position on the Austin Pop Charts on Reverbnation.

Risks & Challenges

What qualifies me to be asking for this is that I'm a bit more mature, but know the value of reaching for a tangible dream with an established name, as well as the value that name holds.  It's a "legit" deal.  I also have spoken with his saxophone player many times in the past regarding their musicianship and set up - he's an awesome musician on his own right.  I'm currently working on my Bachelor of Science degree on audio production and engineering maintaining a very high GPA.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.  I only have two days - literally.  There are only 2 spots left.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

kaliroots is working on a new album ,full roots reggae whit special guest singers from canada,jamaica,usa,and Latin America, whit over 15 musicians that have past in this project for the past 20 years,  the album is gonna include a dub version!! help us make the magic come alive,

kaliroots as already produce independently 2 albums, mixed by Jim fox at lion and fox studio,www.lionfoxrecording.com ,as worked whit junior Marvin (bob Marley and the wailers),

junior recorded 2 song on our last album,(mission internationale 2004)

the project is already started and we need funds to finish it, for recording  and mixing sessions in Montreal at la mifa studio (https://www.facebook.com/studiolamifa/) and at lion and fox studio whit Jim fox

we are due for a new album and want to provide our fans whit the magic of kaliroots

want to know more about kaliroots past.. google it !!!

story:
Short Summary

Les Enfants d'Orphée is a Boston-based chamber ensemble dedicated to the performance of French baroque vocal music. We present innovative performances that make French baroque music immediate and relevant to audiences of every age while giving voice to excellent performers and little known composers. We have welcomed hundreds of audience members ranging from school children from Montréal to senior citizens of the Boston community.  Our performers are among the brightest rising stars in the field of baroque music, and director Ian Pomerantz numbers among the leading interpreters of Sephardic Jewish music. Our upcoming collaboration with the Kol Arev choir of Hebrew College will be the highlight of our third performance season.

Hebrew College is a pluralistic and trans-denominational degree-granting institution in Newton, Massachusetts. Our collaboration with Kol Arev choir will bridge and engage Boston-area communities in a conversation about the importance of tolerance through music from a time in which the future of the Jewish community of France was uncertain.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $3000 by February 1st, 2018.  Your donation will be used to pay the fourteen performers from Les Enfants d’Orphée who will be involved in the concert. It will also enable us to offer free admission to children under the age of 15. As a sponsor, your name or business will be recognized in our program.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread word about our efforts!

Visit our website at www.lesenfantsdorphee.com to find out more about what we do.

Whether or not you choose to give, we would be honored to see you at our concerts.

Share tools on Indiegogo are available. Please share our campaign!

story:
ReEmergence EP and Music Video

We are gearing up to release a 6 track EP which features 4 remixes of songs from our 2018 full length release ‘Race the Sun’ and 2 new songs, ReEmergence and Glas Haus. The mega-talented remixers include Connor Irias (Auralponic), Derek Ryan Barncard (Bludream), Peter Loomis (Mystik) and Chloro Djinn (Chlorophil)

The EP is finished and ready to release and now we need our fans to purchase the EP in advance to cover the costs of the mixing, remix work, mastering, graphics, video and all the other bells and whistles that go into making this thing fly! We’ve worked with some incredible remixers on this one and can’t wait to share these new versions of our album material with you.

In addition to covering some costs of putting out this release, we are also conceptualizing a powerful music video for our track ‘Glas Haus’ on the forthcoming EP.  We have a team of videographers and editors ready to bring this song to visual life. 

It’s been an exciting year of growth for us since the release of ‘Race the Sun’ and we have a number of festivals and exciting shows in our future. We will be debuted our audio/visual performance at Alex and Alison Grey’s Chapel of Sacred Mirrors in February, and 360 audio/visual performance with Michael Strauss at LA’s premiere venue for immersive media called Wisdome in January. We will be appearing at Lucidity, Portal to a New Earth and Lightning in a Bottle festivals and much much more. We are committed to working on the cutting edge/intersection of art, tech, consciousness, spirituality and wellness with our popular Los Angeles collective, Visual Reality.

There are many perks and offerings available for your contributions.  Simply buy the EP or upgrade your experience with more of our catalog of music, private sound healing sessions, music coaching or a sound meditation event in your own space.

Thank you for supporting us and coming on this cosmic journey!

 

About Solar Theory:

The two universes of Torkom Ji and Divasonic collide to form Solar Theory, their collaborative electronic performance and production project. Torkom and Lynda weave deeply mystical and spiritual compositions. Lynda’s vocal and instrumental musings about the universe and evolving consciousness, stories of our journey through time, space and love through connection to source, float over Torkom’s signature 432Hz electronic grooves and soundscapes. 

Solar Theory is unifying the space between sound meditation and live performance through a diversity of form and expression. Their live experience is a download, designed purely to assist one to transcend the limitations of the ego and physical self for something greater that has always been inside. It’s an evolution of sound born out of their sound healing and past production work, and serves as an giant leap in the future of forward thinking music based on universal principles. Their live experience is further enhanced by the visual wizardry of Michael Strauss, creating a mind melding audio-visual experience designed to blow minds and expand hearts. 
 

Their sound meditation offering called 'Language of Light' is an ambient listening experience designed for deep meditation, healing, inner exploration and relaxation.  Their sound healing collaboration centers around creating a safe and grounded space to dive deep within the mind and spirit. The purpose of creating space for internal sound journeying is to resolve and release tensions, receive answers, and cultivate a deeply restful state of integrated awareness.  The Language of Light sessions often incorporate vocal meditation exercises like toning, chanting and breath work to help participants drop into the experience and connect more intimately with themselves.  It is a journey of deep listening. They have shared this experience at dozen of events, festivals and yoga studios.

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Radoslav Vladimirov.I'm an actor, musician, guide and whatever else life takes me to be in my country.
  • I want to make an Album with my songs, because I feel the need to make music in a place where art is replaced by stupidity.
  • So far I got a big and warm welcome from all the people who at some point heard me perform the songs. I think it's time to bring my music to the light.

 

What We Need

  • I'm aiming to raise at lease 10 000 dollars, so I can start releasing more and more songs.
  • All of them are in differen style, so I don't have a specific one that I follow.All the pieces have a different meaning.Mainly I'm writting for love and for the fear which is stopping us to develop.Now more and more ideas for socially involved problems, such as the big dog shelter outside Sofia,which the people don't want to remember that exists, are added to my song list.
  • All the funding is going for the studio rent, musicians and actors, who are performing in the music piece and the video itself.

The Impact

     So far, big and warm emotional smiles from the listeners and exposion of ,,go go go" frases.People  encorage me to continue with what I do.

Risks & Challenges

    If I don't succeed in reaching the funding, it will only slow me down in the process to release the songs.I'll continue to save my own money, so I can make a change here.

Other Ways You Can Help

Watch the video in youtube and enjoy :)

story:
Hard at work horrifying the masses since 2005, Grave Robber have been anything but idle.  Combining bouncy, catchy percussion with riffs and guitar solos as sharp as Dracula’s fangs, Grave Robber’s rugged and raunchy releases – “Be Afraid”, “Inner Sanctum”, Exhumed”, “You’re All Gonna Die” and the "Straight to Hell" e.p.– have garnered these horror rockers well deserved press from acclaimed punk and metal outlets alike for a good reason.  Each song by these prolific punks creates an immersive and haunting atmosphere that has listeners so engaged that they are constantly glancing over their shoulders wondering if Grave Robber is coming for them next.

What's next is a NEW FULL LENGTH RELEASE!  We haven't released a full length album since 2011's "You're All Gonna Die".  It's no secret that we are always trying to outdo previous releases and this upcoming release entitled, "ESCAPING THE GRAVE" is NO DIFFERENT.

WE NEED YOU TO BE INVOLVED OF THIS WILL NOT HAPPEN.

Funding will help record, mix, master, press cds, and shipping to you!

If we don't reach the goal, you will be reimbursed, so really no risk at all.  Think of it as a "pre-order on steroids", in which you lose nothing if this campaign doesn't get funded.  But, if it does, you get some pretty cool stuff AND a copy of Grave Robber's "ESCAPING THE GRAVE" cd.

With the exception of having to wait to receive our vinyls from the plant for 6 months, our track record has been pretty darned good in accomplishing our goal in a timely fashion and getting product to our fans as quickly as humanly possibly.  Even though we had to wait for the vinyl, we STILL made a concession for our fans and Indiegogo supporters by pressing the e.p. on a cd while we waited.  That's gotta count for something, right?

The last four projects Grave Robber has done have been through crowd funding. 

This project will be no exception!  It is of GREAT importance that you not only help fund this project, but that you spread the word via Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, etc.  Indiegogo makes this very simple to do via their share tools!  Plus, let's be honest, it's pretty fun to see something you are responsible for making happen come to fruition, right??

Ok, let's do this!!!

story:
Hi there! We are electronic music producers Koishii & Hush. Our latest single 'Lifetime' is available Feb 3, 2016 on all good digital retailers. The track features Gillian Gilbert of New Order, and the response thus far has been fantastic.

So much so, that a great many have requested this track be released on a limited edition 12" vinyl. In order to do this though it requires funding. Graphics, mastering, manufacturing, packing and shipping are all a part of delivering a top quality product for you the pledger.

Limited Edition 12" Vinyl

We will produce a fully manufactured 12" vinyl limited to just 300 copies. In addition, of these 300 we are offering a very limited 50 copies that will be signed by Koishii & Hush and Gillian Gilbert.

The 12" vinyl tracklist is not yet finalized, but we can announce that it will have an exclusive mix by our friends Leitbur.

If we don't reach our goal of £ 1,600, sadly we will not be able to produce the record. So please, help us get to our goal. We've put a lot of time and effort into this project and we'll be pretty bummed if we can't get you this very limited edition 12" vinyl that you deserve.

Please share this with as many people as you can! You can use Indiegogo's Share Tools, post it on Facebook, Twitter, email or text it.

PLEASE NOTE: Assuming we meet our finding goal, after we submit our order it will take approximately 10-12 weeks to manufacture and then ship the vinyl. Good things come to those who wait :)

story:
First, our Social Media! Follow Us!

http://madmen-and-dreamers.com

https://www.facebook.com/Madmen-and-Dreamers-126910890109/

https://twitter.com/madmendreamers

http://suicide-by-profit-blog.madmen-and-dreamers.com/blog/

Our Campaign

Our Climate Rock Opera; "The Nature of Man" can change the national conversation about climate change in this country. Our band Facebook has 42,000 followers (and rising). The vast majority (93%) are between the ages of 13 and 34 (our twitter is pushing 10k). We hope to use this show to ignite that group by touring the show through colleges, starting in the NYC tri-state area. We want to involve students in the production and bring in environmental groups to help them get organized and moving in defense of their future. Once trained, they can peacefully address local issues and legislation by working against any representatives who don't work in the future's best interest, and working for those who do.

As we tour the show, we would leave these working groups behind us at every school. It would exponentially grow the climate movement with the very people who will have to face it.

Any tour is an expensive undertaking, which is why we're going to lay all our cards right on the table for you. Full disclosure. Below you'll find the required budget for the first 18 shows of the tour.

If we get the funds during our initial effort, it'll be wonderful and we'll go right into production! Whatever we get in excess of our posted budget, will go directly into enhancing the show (set design, lights, sound, projections, etc). In this biz, the bigger the budget, the better the show (and therefore the show's reach)!

Because our show is a live experience, our perks are also in the form of experiences. Check them out!

PROPOSED PRODUCTION BUDGET ESTIMATES

SHOW INCOME
Avg. Ticket price= $30.00 per seat
Based on 10 Small & 8 Large Venues at 80% Capacity

CAPACITY:                        500 – 1,000 SEATS            1,001 – 2, 000  SEATS
TICKETS SOLD                              8,000                                       12,800
GROSS TICKETS                                                                           $624,000.00
MERCHANDISE SOLD:          (65%  X $624,000.00 =)        $406,000.00
SPONSORSHIPS                                                                           $300,000.00      
EST GROSS INCOME                                                                  $1,330,000.00

MINUS:  EST. TOTAL EXPENSES
SHOW EXPENSES                                                                           $664,585.00
ASCAP/BMI FEES                       (TO BE PAID BY VENUES)

EST NET INCOME                                                                           $665,415.00

PRODUCTION & DESIGN FEES

PRODUCER FEES                                                                            $75,000.00
     + 25% of profit  when seat sales are 85% or above (Est. at 50% of all shows)
CROWDFUNDING PR (PUBLICIST)                                             $3000
DIRECTOR / CHOREOGRAPHER/COMBAT COORDINATOR FEES        
$32,015.00 + $1,628.00  UNION P&W=                                    $33,643.00                         
LIGHTING, SET & PROJECTION DESIGNER FEE                   $50,000.00                                                                                                
SOUND DESIGNER FEE (MadElf Productions, Inc.)               $2,000.00

TOTAL:                                                                                             $163,643.00

                                                                   SHOW EXPENSES
AUDITIONS                                  
AUDITION SPACE RENTAL                16 HRS X $20/HR =              $320.00        

AUDITION ACCOMPANIST                16 HRS X $37.50 =                 $600.00
TOTAL:                                                                                                       $920.00

REHEARSALS
REHEARSAL TECH  DAYS      3 DAYS X $800/DAY =               $2,400.00
REHEARSAL ACCOMPANIST   40 HRS X $37.50/HR =            $1,500.00
REHEARSAL SPACE BAND       100 HRS X $30/HR =               $3,000.00
REHEARSAL ACTORS                100 HRS X $30/HR =               $3,000,00
REHEARSAL TECH PERSONNEL  3 DAYS X $20/HR =            $552.00
REHEARSAL LIGHTING             16 HRS X $15/HR =                   $276.00
REHEARSAL DEPOSIT                                                                       $500.00
TOTAL:                                                                                                   $11,228.00

FACILITY RENTAL
500 – 1,000 CAPACITY:                                                      $2,500.00 PER SHOW  
1,001 – 2000 CAPACITY:                                                    $4,500.00  PER SHOW

What your donation will accomplish:

We all know that our government is too compromised to act against climate change in a way that would actually preserve a livable climate for everyone. They need to hear your voice. Loud and consistently. I remember the Vietnam war and Watergate protests that brought down a government. I remember Woodstock and Kent State. I remember Martin Luther King Jr. and the power those peaceful movements represented. That power is still within us. That power is within you. Bernie Sanders' primary campaign showed it for the world to see.

The show will motivate change and you will have contributed to that change. You will help us show students and young people that their voice has immense power in American politics and if every school we play has a dedicated group of activists working on local problems and supporting local politicians who are voting in the future's best interests, I believe we can change the climate conversation in this country. I believe that we can turn the tide against those who are only trying to enrich themselves and their donors. I believe that we can steer our path toward a future filled with hope. 

Risks & Challenges

It's a big show. The logistics of moving and performing it are going to be very important. When we were touring The Children of Children, we learned to anticipate and plan for potential problems (and we had some whoppers) . Everything has to be planned out and everyone has to understand their roles. It has to be run almost like an army.

Will there be challenges? Absolutely. It's unavoidable. The difference between success and failure is how you look at the problem. If you see it as an opportunity, you've already won. When my children were young I used to tell them that there was an opportunity in every disaster. The trick was finding it. I also taught them how to work a problem; consider the simplest (and least expensive) solution first.

And always have a fallback plan.

If you cannot donate . . .

The importance of getting the word out cannot be overstated. A "buzz" is absolutely necessary for success. You can help generate one. Talk up what we're doing and why. Start with those closest to you; your family. Work outward from there.

Please also use the Indiegogo share tools you find on our page! They are a great way of telling the world what we're up to!

 

The Creators

The Nature of Man was written and conceived by Mark A. Durstewitz, Christine Hull and Mario Renes.

Mark A. Durstewitz is the founding member of Madmen and Dreamers and has been a keyboard player/composer/producer and audio engineer for most of his life. He wrote and scored our fist rock opera; "The Children of Children" and produced its entire regional tour of all the way up and through a limited, Off-Broadway run at the Bleecker Street Theater in NYC during the winter of 2008/2009.

Mark and Christine were also part of The People's Climate March with Mark being the stage manager at the Javitz Center at the end of the march, and Chris bringing the talent through the NYC subway system (long story). It was an amazing day and we met so many cool people.  Mark got a huge hug from Peter Yarrow (Peter, Paul and Mary), which he will treasure for the rest of his life.

Christine Hull is a writer/composer and an actress/singer/dancer. She is a published poet with a Bachelor's Degree in Musical Theatre from the Hartt School of Music. She has appeared on New York and regional stages, as well as in film, television and commercials. She earned Outstanding Female Supporting Lead for her role in Starting Here, Starting Now. She wrote lyrics, melodies and harmonies for The Children of Children and originated the role of Mother. She recorded the concept albums for both The Children of Children and Remembrance (now called The Nature of Man) and has been the vocal coach for all recordings and performances of both projects. Her acting experience brings depth to the character development and story-boarding process that is the hallmark of Madmen and Dreamers.

Mario Renes is classically trained on the piano, woodwind and brass instruments and could not ignore the call to write music and perform. He became proficient with the electric bass, being fond of the low end in music. Playing rock ‘n roll in bands that eventually played originals, led Mario into recording studios. While learning the process of recording, Mario met studio owners and engineers. Two of the engineers he worked with started Indie Music Productions. Mario eventually became a partner. In this company, Mario wrote music; performed as a studio musician; was an assistant engineer; and participated in music pre-production and production. After hitting a slow period, Mark Durstewitz (an old college friend) looking for a bass player to record a rock opera, contacted Mario. With this recording gig, Mario became Madmen and Dreamers’ bass player; co-produced “The Children of Children” (the rock opera) and became part owner and Secretary of MadElf Productions. Mario has since moved on to other projects.
story_txt:
First, our Social Media! Follow Us!
http://madmen-and-dreamers.com
https://www.facebook.com/Madmen-and-Dreamers-126910890109/
https://twitter.com/madmendreamers
http://suicide-by-profit-blog.madmen-and-dreamers.com/blog/
Our Campaign
Our Climate Rock Opera; "The Nature of Man" can change the national conversation about climate change in this country. Our band Facebook has 42,000 followers (and rising). The vast majority (93%) are between the ages of 13 and 34 (our twitter is pushing 10k). We hope to use this show to ignite that group by touring the show through colleges, starting in the NYC tri-state area. We want to involve students in the production and bring in environmental groups to help them get organized and moving in defense of their future. Once trained, they can peacefully address local issues and legislation by working against any representatives who don't work in the future's best interest, and working for those who do.
As we tour the show, we would leave these working groups behind us at every school. It would exponentially grow the climate movement with the very people who will have to face it.
Any tour is an expensive undertaking, which is why we're going to lay all our cards right on the table for you. Full disclosure. Below you'll find the required budget for the first 18 shows of the tour.
If we get the funds during our initial effort, it'll be wonderful and we'll go right into production! Whatever we get in excess of our posted budget, will go directly into enhancing the show (set design, lights, sound, projections, etc). In this biz, the bigger the budget, the better the show (and therefore the show's reach)!
Because our show is a live experience, our perks are also in the form of experiences. Check them out!

story:
I'm Marie Louise a 19yr old from a small town in Maryland and I crave to create my dreams.

This is more then just creating my next EP & Album it's about creating my future making music my full time career. By updating my home studio equipment it'll give me the ability to produce the exact sound I envision.

Better Equipment = Better Sound Quality

My goal is $8,000 because music tools aren't cheap and I need upgrades, I calculated the costs with everything I intended on purchasing.

I will be purchasing equipment such as a Recording Mic, Headphones, an Interface, a Refurbished iMac, Studio Monitors, Music/Video Editing Softwares, a Keyboard + Drum Pads, Roland Sampler, Organelle, Performance Mic/Speaker, and other Musical Tools!

My current set up is minimalistic but I've made so much with what I have. 

I'm capable of producing and conducting works of music even with my limited materials. I want to show the world what I could make with the best possible materials to put my vision out there. It's a matter of growth and growing with the elements around and inside yourself. 

I made my first album Loner Livin' with my Blue Yeti USB Microphone and I mixed/edited my songs on a Sony Movie editing software. If I so desired to add vocal effects I used Sony Sound Forge which was with my 6yr old decaying HP Laptop. Although I created my music in a different and more difficult way, I wanted to make music and I used what I had at the time to make music that I love.

With my next EP Fresh James and second album Je Sais Pas. I got a refurbished MacBook then I began to use GarageBand to record, mix, and master on. Still using the same microphone as before but I paid another musician to remaster my album Je Sais Pas.

I've been on a very long journey in improving my health and mental state as my previous music projects have shown.

My music holds special messages for those who feel alone and are struggling with their mental health. I share my experiences to let people know there's someone speaking for them too. As someone who's struggled with anxiety and depression for a majority of her life. I touch on the surface of that in my most recent release "I Don't Know Why". There's so much more for me to say and the world needs more awareness on these topics now more then ever. That's exactly what I'm aiming to be apart of, the movement in cultivating a conscious society.

My experiences have shaped who I am and the music I create. I strive to create the most authentic music I can make.

I've been doing a lot of shadow work and reflection on traumatic experiences I've endured. Which has resulted in more writing again like I used to and being more in tune with my feelings and emotions again. There was a period of time where I had stopped writing everyday. Which was the exact time I stopped being in tune with how I really felt. I am now getting back in that groove while digging inside to repair deeper rooted thought habits. I feel I've learned what I needed and no longer need to repeat similar terrible patterns to be shown that. I have all the songs written for the EP and album, now I just want the proper materials to make an amazing album.

If you can't make a donation but want to help you still can!

Share. Share. Share! By word of mouth or on social media any form of exposure to my campaign is important. Thank you!

My Website: https://celinemarielouise.com/​

SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/maarielouuise

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/1XLhmXH2Mgb3aSarcD8qwz?si=lUqWsA5j

iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/marie-louise/152689941

bandcamp: https://maarielouuise.bandcamp.com/

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/maarielouuise/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MaarieLouuise

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/maarielouuise/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/timelessimagination

story:
Why a Jazz Lima Festival in Peru?

We´re Asociación de Jazz de Lima, a group of people that believes in the music power of transformation and connection, and more if that music is jazz.  That’s why we want to bring jazz to kids, young people and adults of different social conditions, as a tool to increase tolerance and integration in our country.

 With your support we will be able to continue creating and disseminating #jazzmadeinperu with its own refinements and fusion that makes it ours.

Jazz Lima Festival is: #jazzmadeinperu

·  International and national musicians

·  One month (April 2016) of jazz in different places in Lima, Peru

·  Concerts in public spaces

·  Shows in cultural centers

·  Urban incursions

·  Concerts in universities

·  Workshops

Jazz Lima Festival is for:

·  University students

·  Teachers

·  Professionals and amateurs musicians

·  Families

What do we need?

We need to reach the goal of $10,000 in one month and a half to make this Festival come true and be able to do all the shows around Lima, Peru (parks, squares, etc.)

How can you help and what will you receive?

Donate today! This way you support the diffusion and creation of #Jazzmadeinperu and you´ll receive in exchange a ticket to watch live stream the concert for the International Jazz Day on April 30 in a public space in Lima, Peru. Celebrate with us what we have achieved thanks to your donation!

Also can help us by sharing this campaign so more people will now about #jazzmadeinperu

Be a part of our history and help us realize this dream to connect more people with our Peruvian music #jazzmadeinperu.

_____________________________________________________________________________

¿Por qué un festival de jazz en Lima-Perú?

Somos la Asociación de Jazz de Lima, un grupo de personas que creemos en el poder de transformación y conexión de la música y sobretodo del Jazz por eso queremos llevar este género musical a niños, jóvenes y adultos de diferentes condiciones sociales, como una herramienta para fomentar la tolerancia y la integración en nuestro país.

Además con tu apoyo podremos seguir creando y difundiendo el #jazzhechoenperu con los matices que lo caracterizan y que lo hacen tan nuestro.

El festival de Jazz Lima es:  #jazzhechoenperu

•  Músicos nacionales e internacionales

•  Un mes (abril 2016) de jazz en diversos puntos de la ciudad de Lima

•  Conciertos en espacios públicos

•  Shows artísticos en centros culturales

•  Incursiones urbanas

•  Conciertos en universidades

•  Talleres

El festival llegará a:

• Estudiantes universitarios

• Docentes

•  Músicos profesionales y amateurs

•  Familias

¿Qué necesitamos?

Necesitamos llegar en un mes y medio a la meta de $10,000 para hacer realidad este festival y poder realizar todas las presentaciones descentralizadas en la ciudad de lima (parques, plazas, etc.)

¿Cómo puedes ayudar y qué tendrás a cambio?

¡Donando hoy! De esta manera apoyarás a la difusión y creación del #Jazzhechoenperu  y tendrás a cambio una entrada para ver por streaming el concierto por el Día Internacional del Jazz en un espacio público de Lima, Perú.  Así podrás compartir y celebrar con nosotros lo que logramos con tu donación el día 30 de Abril.

También puedes ayudarnos difundiendo esta campaña para que así más gente se entere de lo que está sucediendo en nuestro país.

Se parte de nuestra historia y ayúdanos a hacer realidad este sueño de conectar a más personas con nuestra música peruana #jazzhechoenperu.

http://jazzenlima.org

story:
RESERVE YOUR AUSTRALIAN HOME CONCERT DATE BY

CLICKING HERE

After playing over 100 intimate home concerts around the world, Jesse Macht has again been invited to play in homes throughout Australia!

After the immense success of the campaigns in the past for such a refreshing unique concert experience, we're yet again making an unconventional proposal to help make it happen this coming spring.

We are hoping that Jesse's fan-base, potential hosts, past hosts, and other friends and family who have already experienced the intimacy and power of these home concerts will REQUEST and/or PAY IT FORWARD and support this new venture. 

We're looking for guaranteed reservations and contributions to help CROWD-FUND these concerts for new fans who may not be able to cover the costs of the concert on their own (and will also help defray Jesse's travel expenses). 

YES THIS IS A BIG ASK - HELP SOMEONE ELSE HAVE A CONCERT! We are reaching out on behalf of new audiences for Jesse Macht who want the experience of a home concert, but have the challenge of getting him across the PACIFIC.

This tour is called the "SHARE A STORY" Home Concert tour. One of the most compelling parts of the home concert experience is when Jesse and the audiences begin to talk about the stories behind the songs, and inevitably conversations begin between he and the audience. It makes for great memories, stories, and sharing of stories, laughing, and crying. 

Because of this, Jesse is going to give away his new record to anyone attending his Australian home concerts who are willing to share their story with him.

If a song that he performed, or has recorded has evoked a connection to something personal in your life that you are willing to share with Jesse and his audience, he will trade you his record for that story to add to a collection of similar stories from his travels across Australia.

At the end of the tour, he will publish that collection to give to everyone that donated to this campaign.

story:
“No matter how much time passes, no matter what takes place in the interim, there are some things we can never assign to oblivion, memories we can never rub away.” - Haruki Murakami


Short Summary

Condemned to oblivion, a 90 year old factory comes back to life. A fascinating story of strength, determination and resilience. In this book that i present to you, i reveal what i found, by pure chance, in the course of my professional activity. I had the opportunity to witness and photograph the rebirth and development of a factory founded in 1920, whose facilities have been abandoned for years, and once relies on the contribution of almost a thousand employees, but unfortunately,  due to market circumstances,  had to face two processes of insolvency. Through this book you can make a journey in a place full of character and history, from oblivion… to revival…


What We Need & What You Get

As a photography enthusiast, i look for the opportunity to publish my first book. I want to share my work and my vision. But i have no interest to see my book published and forgotten on some shelve of a library, or in some boxes in a warehouse, waiting for years for someone to notice them, or later, to be dispatched in a massive discount sale. Therefor, the crowd funding is in my opinion the most appealing option, because the book is only published, if there is a group of people that really treasure and had been drawn and capture, in some way, by these photos.

If i achieve my goal, the money raised will finance the publication of the book. For this, I have to offer to contributors the following perks:

  •  Photo print -  10 x 15 cm - 5€


  • Photo print - 20 x 30 cm - 10€


  • Photo Print - 40 x 60 cm - 15€


  • Book - 40€


About Myself

Photography has always been a passion to me, self-taught, I have already developed several studies in this field. I tried not to set in in a specific area, not due to a drift, but searching for a personal path, and always seeking for originality. I hope that the publication of this book can represent other opportunities in this area that i truly appreciate.

You can check my profile on 500px!


Risks & Challenges

There are no associated risks. The photos are ready and the book is edited. I just need to collect a sufficient number of interested backers to justify this publication.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t contribute, that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Please share this campaign with your friends on facebook, twitter or send to your email contacts who you think might be interested in this project.

The Indiegogo share tools on this site can help get the word out!

story:
Hi!

We want to make a Debut Album and shoot music videos because we want to be famous. Thank you for your support.  Peace
story_txt: Hi!We want to make a Debut Album and shoot music videos because we want to be famous. Thank you for your support.  Peace

story:
Who we are?

We are metal band from Russia. Released two studio albums in 2015 and 2017 by Soyuz Music label. All albums was mixed and mastered by legendary Roland Grapow (Masterplan, ex-Helloween). We also worked with great American singer John West (ex-Royal Hunt, ex-Artension) on our second album.

In near time we plan to start working on our next album but now we want to make really cool music video!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need

We need to cover all the expenses concerning:

  • Film crew services: director, cameraman, make-up man, script-writer, technicians, assistants
  • Shooting equipment: cameras, lighting equipment, generators of smoke and wind, crane and other
  • Rent of shooting area and props
  • Video editing and color corrections
  • Сarrying cost

We need $4000 to make really cool video

You get

We will glad to present you some of our Crimson Cry merch:

Our guitar pics, which you guitarist and bass player use

CDs of two our albums albums

And many other interesting things

And of course as a result you will see the perfect video, and you will know, that you are part of this great work too

The Impact

Crimson Cry is our life. We are so happy to make music for you and it's very important for us that you like our music and that our music helps you in your life. And we try to do it better and better to bring more cool things for you

According to many surveys we realized that Falling in Love is your favourite song. That's why this song was chosed for our future music video.

Risks and Challenges

The making of this music video is our main aim now, and we will do it. We are already have agreement with director and film crew about collaboration and we will start filming in 2-4 weeks after the end of campaign. Also we will keep a diary about working process and you will see what happens on the shooting area.

We don't foresee any major delays and expect to start shipping rewards in 1 week after the end of campaign.  We have good experience of shipping our merch all over the world.

In addition, we are always in touch and you can always contact us.

Other Ways You Can Help

We also will be very grateful if you will talk about our campaign to your friends and share our video or campaign through your social media

 

Only you can help us to realize this video! We work for you, we make our music for you!!! And we hope we can do it together!

story:
We love live music and believe that music has a unique way of bringing people together.   Everyone should be able to experience the collective joy of watching a concert.  So, we’re creating a free weekly music series that supports Burlington's music scene.   Bring your family.  Bring your friends.  Bring your neighbours.  Bring your lawn chair.  Most importantly, bring your earholes.

 

Our ask

Our goal of $7,000 will help us get started with renting park space, sound systems and paying the musicians.  Your contribution tells us that the community is as excited about the Songs and Sunsets Music Series as we are!  Consider your contribution as a way to set your own ticket price for an event that supports local music in Burlington.  Check out the perks that are available to our contributors

 

The Impact

Your local park should be a gathering place where you can connect with others in your community.  Watching live music is a shared experience that can bring us all a bit closer with our neighbours.  The Songs and Sunsets Music Series wants to enhance neighbourhood connections, while giving more exposure to local musicians. 

Consider supporting the Songs and Sunsets Music Series to rediscover your local green space and build a culture that celebrate the arts.  The more you can spread the word about this fundraising campaign, and the more you can help make the Songs and Sunsets Music Series a reality for Burlington.   

Let's put Burlington on the map as a music city.

story:
Welcome to BEND

This has been such a fun album to work on.  Justin's vocal melodies, lyrical content and all round organic musicianship gives such a nice taste to the electronic timbre mixed with Sean's powerful drum grooves.   The BEND Album was meant to be a story of a journey between stars, passing down a street in a solar neighbourhood with sexual undertones.  We have only completed 1/3 of the story and need your help to tell the rest of it.  

Perk Pack Items

 ***NOTE T-SHIRT AND HOODIE PERKS.  PLEASE PLACE YOUR CHOICE WHITE OR BLACK AND SIZE BESIDE YOUR NAME WHEN YOU ENTER IT (ex Joe Blow WM).  IF YOU HAVE ALREADY PURCHASED YOUR PERK WE WILL CONTACT YOU BY EMAIL.

Budgeting Breakdown

Costs

  • OCL Studio's      2 days  @  800.00/day  + Tax  = 1680.00
    • Record drums 
  • CPS Mastering
    • 6 tracks    480.00 + Tax =  504.00

TOTAL STUDIO COSTS = 2,184.00

  • We would also like to remaster Safe Harbour (there is noise on the track that is driving me crazy).  This was my own fault and we will not be adding to the campaign amount needed. Just wanted to let you know it will be that little bit better.
  • Merch Costs (All merchandise costs change depending on quantity ordered)
    • Sunglasses 4.00 each + Tax =  4.20
    • T-Shirts 6.00 each + Tax =  6.30
    • Hoodie 30.00 each + Tax =  31.50
    • Vinyl 35.00 each + Tax = 36.75
      • Total Cost = 78.75  + Shipping Costs which vary depending on package contents.
        • This is factored into our perk packs but is counted as funding by indiegogo towards our goal.

This makes "The Everthing Bundle"  perk the best value  for contributors by far.   

  • Indiegogo, Paypal and Credit Card Costs Avg 8-10 % = 500.00

TOTAL Needed For Campaign Success   5,500.00 

The Goal

The group of people all working together on this album have so much talent and the songs are so great it would be wasted letting Solar Interstellar Cetacea, Absolute Wonder, Have No Fear, Enter The Rhythm and Quaver just sit on my computer.  

If we reach our goal there are many things to set in motion.  Pre Production will have to be done for drums and vocals,  There are a couple of tunes that need some editing and bass replacement.  OCL Studio's will need to be booked for recording.  Post recording there will be editing, mixing and mastering for each track.  Once mastering has been completed its time to fulfill all our perk packs and look at an album release date which we would like to make no later then April/May 2017.  With a release set for stores, its time to get an electronic press kit out there.  And You....We can't say it any other way.  Without you there would be no BEND.  We would all like to thank you so very much and we would like to thank the people who are responsible for this site. So good. 

    Other Ways To Help

    Help us further our reach by posting about our campaign on your favourite social media.  If you have any ideas on how we could expand or better our campaign, it would be greatly appreciated. bendthebandemail@gmail.com

    And that's all there is to it.

    Thank You

    So far already to get us this far we would like to thank the following people

    Kristy Biafore-for being such a loving and devoted wife to me (Anthony)

    Luke Smit-for adding such tasty baselines and being a large role on the EP

    Justin Van Groningen-for also playing a large role in recording the EP

    Sarah Biafore-for all the awesome Art Work

    Adam Erickson-for being a part of the project from early on and for just being you!

    Jorge Mares-for donating all 4 videos for youtube page

    Micheal Sanchez-for all the sick ideas for the campaign

Indiegogo, Paypal and Credit Card Costs Avg 8-10 % = 500.00
TOTAL Needed For Campaign Success   5,500.00 
The Goal
The group of people all working together on this album have so much talent and the songs are so great it would be wasted letting Solar Interstellar Cetacea, Absolute Wonder, Have No Fear, Enter The Rhythm and Quaver just sit on my computer.  
If we reach our goal there are many things to set in motion.  Pre Production will have to be done for drums and vocals,  There are a couple of tunes that need some editing and bass replacement.  OCL Studio's will need to be booked for recording.  Post recording there will be editing, mixing and mastering for each track.  Once mastering has been completed its time to fulfill all our perk packs and look at an album release date which we would like to make no later then April/May 2017.  With a release set for stores, its time to get an electronic press kit out there.  And You....We can't say it any other way.  Without you there would be no BEND.  We would all like to thank you so very much and we would like to thank the people who are responsible for this site. So good. 


Other Ways To Help
Help us further our reach by posting about our campaign on your favourite social media.  If you have any ideas on how we could expand or better our campaign, it would be greatly appreciated. bendthebandemail@gmail.com
And that's all there is to it.Thank YouSo far already to get us this far we would like to thank the following peopleKristy Biafore-for being such a loving and devoted wife to me (Anthony)Luke Smit-for adding such tasty baselines and being a large role on the EPJustin Van Groningen-for also playing a large role in recording the EPSarah Biafore-for all the awesome Art WorkAdam Erickson-for being a part of the project from early on and for just being you!Jorge Mares-for donating all 4 videos for youtube pageMicheal Sanchez-for all the sick ideas for the campaign

story:
Short Summary

We are Christian and Zorzes Katris and we are presenting you with our first recorded CD album production titled Bouzouki Nova, through the platform of funded participation. In the last few years we have been delving deeper into the composition of ethnic orchestral music through the blending of hybrid techniques of composition, based on the popular Greek Ethnic instrument ‘’Bouzouki’’ accompanied by a classical compact entity of strings, piano and accordion.
The main musical influences of this album derive from Bach, Beethoven, Astor Piazolla , Hans Zimmer and last but not least from the very popular Greek composer George Zambetas, inspiring us through an extensive experience in theoretical knowledge and musical sounds to produce a hybrid and exceptional orchestral synthesis.
 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Our goal is to raise €4,000 to cover the cost of a full-length album.
  • The "Bouzouki Nova" comes in a collective CD album edition consisting of five independent parts (movements) as well as two official video clips thereby creating a palette of high virtuosity and compact orchestration in both the solo part and the orchestral one.
  • As a flexible campaign, if we raise less than the desired goal we will still being pressed/duplicated of the CD Album as the budget allows.
  • Album artwork and design
  • Delivery and Postage Package
  • Director for video clips filiming
     

The Impact

We are recommending and presenting an innovation in the development of musical composition and orchestration based on film and classical music through a long experience of concerts.

  • We believe Music intersects with cultural boundaries, facilitating our “social self” by linking our shared experiences and intentions. Also music is a core human experience by facilitating human contact, human meaning, and human imagination of possibilities, tying it to our social instincts.
  • There are all of you who help and support the human spirit, and this is a great power to become better and to take another step in the future!
     

Risks & Challenges

The pivotal core of this music emerged when we were asked to participate in a very successful first concert for bouzouki and orchestra in the Athens Concert Hall many years ago.

  • Ever since then, a long quest for new techniques in composition and musical form began with the Greek national instrument ‘’Bouzouki’’ in the lead role aiming to fuse the traditional sound with that of classical music.
     

Other Ways You Can Help

We would like to thank you and we understand if you can't help us financially at this time, but that doesn't mean you can't help:
We ask that you hope for the success of this campaign and ask you to please share it using the Indiegogo share tools to everyone in your world, or ask that you Like our Facebook page.

  • Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/bouzoukinova/
  • add the campaign to your favorites
  • Sharing this campaign on social media
  • Emailing your friends and family
     

We would like to thank you and show our appreciation for your support, since we can guarantee an unparalleled experience for anyone who is interested in the acquisition of this collective edition of the CD album Bouzouki Nova thus enriching their favorite CD collection with a new source of ethnic and film musical experience.

Best,
Christian & Zorzes Katris

story:
My story

My name is Jon and for the past 8 years I have been working on developing a record label named 7 Thunders Entertainment. Finally after all this time we are almost ready to launch. 

However, over the past 8 years we have invested all our capitol in the company and with having to pay on loans, leaves us at a standstill. We cannot afford the little bit of capitol we still need to make us official and a fully legitimate business that is a registered american record label. We are asking for help I'm not about to give up my baby. (metaphorically)

We have put together the services that would be most beneficial to aspiring artists as your donations mean everything to us. We decided to give our best services to you free of charge based on donation amount. This is simply our way of saying thank you!

Our digital distribution services will allow artists to sell their music through online businesses such as: Google Music, Amazon, iTunes, Apple store, Napster, Raphsody, Beats and around 200+ more vendors.

Thank you for your valuable time and generosity.

story:
Short Summary

We are the Pride of Industry's award-winning Workman High School Marching Band, located in the City of Industry, comprised of students from La Puente, and part of the Hacienda La Puente school district. We started competitive field marching seven years ago and with help from donors like yourself, we have had six championship seasons! Last year the band took a brief hiatus as their practice field was renovated, and this year the band is back and ready to perform for you!

Our students have taken your wonderful support and transformed it into hard a work ethic, life-long relationships, and a commitment to make their community proud. Your contribution will help fund our season, as the students forge new bonds, learn life lessons, push new limits, and work towards keeping a tradition of excellence -- all thanks to your support!

What We Need & What You Get

In one year, to keep our entire music program running, we fundraise over $50,000 for our program. Our marching season uses the largest portion of this. We need help to fund that season for our students. 

As a perk we are offering tickets and tables to our acclaimed Spring Guest Artist Concert, also known as our  "Concert Under The Stars", that has featured Grammy-nominated winning acts like Gordon Goodwin, Poncho Sanchez, Wayne Bergeron,  Francisco Torres, Willie Murillo, and Bob Sheppard. 

The Impact

The impact of your donation will transform these young students' lives, where they will learn to work as a team for a common goal. We have never let our donors down as we have successively made it to the Southern California School Band and Orchestra Association Championships (SCSBOA) every year we have entered. YOU are the ones that make all the difference in these students' lives! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, we understand, there are other ways in which you can assist. You can simply help us spread the word about our program fundraiser by using indiegogo's sharing features, or you can donate your talents if you have the time.

Please help these amazingly talented kids to reach their goal! We thank you kindly!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Mariam Universe
I am an independent singer-songwriter in Armenia.

Music is my life because since childhood I wanted to become singer and song writer. I want to motivate people with my songs, help them emotionally with my music. I write since 2000. https://soundcloud.com/muniverse3

I went to TUMO https://tumo.org . There I studied song writing, I made armenian national music’s modern electronic version https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x9kfibR3Dkw . Then I learned how to produce my songs and make song about xmas https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1OqFn_Y3p-A . 

In 2017 I go to Nvak music camp https://nvak.org/ . We learned how to make money with songwriting, how to sing , how to write music for money and for us. We learned how to busking and sing in open mics . We have tried to cooperate with Capital Cities and Serj Tankian. Unfortunately, I can’t show you my song with Nvak, because I have signed contract like songwriter, and Nvak selling  my song so it’s private. 

In 2017 I started to busk in the streets in Georgia with american old busker we sing armenian Komitas in american motives. Then I busk with turkish friend in Armenia and it was fun because we get armenians, azeri, turkish and muslims together and they were in peace. That was  very cool.
In 2018 I've lost my fate about writing music, because I didn't received back what I've write, Tumo didn't send me  my songs professional studio versions that I write in 7 years studying there. I didn't know what happened with my songs, my babies, so I go underground.

In 2019 , right now I don't want to step back from my dreams, and ask you for help, right now I am working as a waitress and busking in northern avenue, doing freelance graphic design, making little money but all of that money doesn't count even for macbook pro or midi or microphone.
 

I have a project and if you help me to make my dream, I will make armenian musicians free debut albums too, and made them independent, will teach them how to write their own songs how to sell their songs.
And 2nd I will make armenian traditional music's new versions.

This is my childhood dream, so I hope you'll like it and fund me. Then you will listen about new armenian musicians that growing and knowing what is independent music.

For all of that I need 5000$, because I need to buy
Macbook Pro 2014.
Professional Microphone for recordings
Midi Keyboard
Speakers
Electro-acoustic guitar and it's attributes
Headphones
And rent apartment

I want to make a vlog about funding, and how I making my dream studio, make a vlog about armenian musicians who will ask me for help, about our co-operating, about our new songs how we record how we write a song.  About our albums.
You can follow my youtube channel or my facebook and be notified about my project there when the crowdfunding will be ended.

Thank you very much for watching and for making our dreams come true.

story:
Nice Day Friend:

I´m a Music Producer. In my  musical productions, I channel and integrate high vibration energies, to generate pleasure and well-being to the listener of my music...

It´s Trance Happy, Harmonious, Cheerful, Rhythmic, Revitalizing …

I will allocate your contributions, according to the amount collected, to defray the investment made in the production of the album:

  • Production, Mixing and Mastering.
  • Study Expenses, Vocalists, Hardware.
  • Continuous Professional Training to keep up to date.
  • … and new projects.
  • (The contents will be delivered in digital format. This is how we collaborate to create for a planet and an ecological humanity)

Soy Productor Musical. En mis producciones musicales, canalizo Reiki e integro energías de alta vibración, para generar placer, bienestar y revitalizaral oyente de mi música.

Trance Feliz, Armoniosa, Alegre, Rítmica, Revitalizante ...

Trance Feliz. Trance de la Era de Acuario.  Creado con Reiki. Trance inspirado en meditación por energías del amor para crear buenas vibraciones en el oyente.

Trance Feliz, Armonioso, Alegre, Rítmico, Revitalizador ...

Trance profesional, hecho con excelentes técnicas profesionales de producción, mezcla y mastering.

Destinaré vuestras aportaciones, para sufragar la inversión realizada en la producción del álbum:

  • Producción, Mezcla, Mastering.
  • Gastos del estudio, Vocalistas, Hardware.
  • Formación Profesional Contínua para mantenerme al día.
  • ... y Nuevos proyectos
  • (Los contenidos se entregarán en formato digital. Así colaboramos para crear por un planeta y una humanidad ecológica)

 

Rewards:

3 types of rewards are offered for collaborators: FULL and BASIC:

FULL (Album + Bonus) € 10.

• GodTrancer - Reiki digital album.
• Bonus of 2 Exclusive Tracks.
• Album cover.
• Accreditation of Official Recognition as Sponsor of the Project.

BASIC (Album Only) € 5.

• GodTrancer - Reiki digital album
• DISCOUNTED digital album, for a price lower than the official sale price.
• Album cover.

Recompensas

Se ofrencen 3 modalidades de recompensas para los colaboradores: FULL y BASIC:

FULL (Álbum + Bonus) 10 €.

• Álbum digital GodTrancer - Reiki.
• Bonus de 2 Tracks Exclusivos.
• Portada del álbum.
• Acreditación de Reconocimiento Oficial como Patrocinador del Proyecto.

BASIC (Solo Álbum) 5 € .

• Álbum digital GodTrancer - Reiki, con 5 Tracks.
• Álbum digital con DESCUENTO, por un precio menor al precio de venta oficial.
• Portada del álbum.

story:
Caro essere umano,

forse almeno una volta hai sentito parlare della Tafel Musik, un'altra band persa nel marasma delle band indipendenti del mondo.  Come vedi abbiamo già fatto un passo in più: da oggi non potrai dire di non aver mai sentito il nome Tafel Musik.


Il nostro primo album si intitola Disinfectiona e lo potete ascoltare gratuitamente a questo link:

http://www.rockit.it/TafelMusik/album/disinfect...

E qui puoi trovare la recensione di Rockit.it:

http://www.rockit.it/recensione/27536/tafelmusik-disinfectiona

Tante persone ci hanno detto che la nostra è una musica perfetta da ascoltare in auto o mentre si è in vacanza. Il nostro obiettivo nel 2015 è registrare il secondo album per farvi ascoltare ascoltare i nuovi brani. 


E a voi cosa ne viene in tasca?

In questo momento nella tua carta di credito c'è un pezzo del nostro destino. Può essere un piccolo pezzo o un pezzo enorme, non importa, di solito i pezzi del destino sono tutti importanti. Noi abbiamo 2000€ e abbiamo bisogno di altri 2000€ per registrare il nostro secondo album "Why, Nico?".

4000 € è il budget complessivo che comprende la registrazione dei brani, mix e mastering del disco e la stampa dei cd. 

La vostra non è una donazione, è un pre-acquisto di "Why, Nico?".

Perché vogliamo fare dei cd nel 2015? Non potremmo fare semplicemente un album online? Hai tutte le ragioni di chiedere, il problema è che i locali pagano sempre meno e avere un cd da vendere ai concerti è qualcosa di fondamentale per consentirci di continuare a suonare.

In più vi abbiamo preparato una bellissima maglietta colorata della Tafel con sopra il dinosauro delle nostre prime locandine. 


Se non ve la sentite di contribuire a livello economico non preoccupatevi, sarebbe già tanto se poteste aiutarci a condividere l'iniziativa con i vostri amici. E' facilissimo, basta usare il tasto di condivisione di Indiegogo!

story:
Mk836 Welcomes You To : Atari Days

Mk836 Is A Collaboration Between Producer/Vocalist/Multi-Instrumentalist : Brother Noyze The Mad Musician And Producer/Mc : D-Cypl

              Your Funding Will Help Us Spread Our Music To Even More Listeners And Create A Product That Fully Realizes Our Vision. We Want To Offer A 3 Disc Cd Set (18 New Songs And 14 Remixes Of Those Songs). A 44 Minute 12 inch Vinyl With A Different Set Of Remixes And Exclusive Vinyl Only Songs and Downloads Of All The Songs (Except The Vinyl Exclusives). There Are Also Many Fun And Personal Perks To Get Through Funding (Sponsor List On Cd, FaceTime Chats,Custom Lego Mini-Figures,Etc). So Much Is Possible And Your Funding Is The Missing Element. Funding Goes Towards Cd And Vinyl Manufacturing As Well As Video Marketing, Etc. Join Us On This Journey. Help Us Turn A Vision Into A Reality. This Album Is Very Personal Yet We Feel So Many Will Be Able To Relate To The Lyrical Content. (Digital Versions Of The Album Will Be Delivered In October) 

Click Here To Listen To Select Atari Days Songs

story:
The best of inspirations usually come in moments. And when that moment comes, you have a very small window of opportunity to grab it and keep it, before it goes away for good. WE FEEL THAT MOMENT NOW!


INTRO

Every year, Novi Sad is hosting the biggest music festival in Eastern Europe that brings hundreds of thousands of visitors from around the world to enjoy variety of musical genres performed throughout the week long event. It is also a home to numerous talented musicians and composers that have had successful national and international careers. However, all this is going on despite the fact that aside from classical music academy, Novi Sad doesn’t have an infrastructure for young musicians to hone their craft. This is where Mad House Project steps in. 

As a team with over 60 years of combined experience, we are looking to build an independent community studio where young musicians will be able to learn the proper basics of playing modern instruments (guitar, drums, base, etc), learn basics of the sound production (live and in studio), and participate in local gigs and festivals. 


HOW ARE WE GOING TO DO THIS?


* Build a profesional recording studio.

* Provide classes for beginners and intermediate students for a nominal cost  (enough to cover the overhead).

* Organize studio setup lessons.

* Put together FREE concerts where students can showcase their art.

* Work with local schools to encourage young artists to pursue their music dream.


Timeline: 

September 2015 - studio and equipment set up.

November 2015 - recording, classes, and rehearsals begin. 

February 2016 - Music Festival. The winner of the festival records an album in the studio for free.  

Where is your money going? 

We are in process in securing the studio location and obtaining building permitting. We just need your help in reaching our goal to start building out the studio. All Indigogo funding will go towards covering the labor, material, and equipment of the studio. 

Team

Željko - Rhythm guitar. Learned from some of the best in business (Besni, Pop and Cuni). Mastermind behind this project.

Dejan - Lead guitar. Sound setup and equipment specialist. Learned from and played with some of the best guitarist in Novi Sad. 

Uglješa - Self-taught drummer with excellent technique and sense of rhythm. Mixing and mastering specialist. 

Igor - Bass guitar. Learned everything he knows from one of the best bassist in Serbia, Vlada Samardžić. Creative song writer. 

Aleksandar Bogdanović Ćufi - Serbian Chris Cornell :-) Song writer, great voice, fantastic technique.    

Nikola - Lead guitar. Learned from one of the best guitar players in the world, Radomir Mihajlović - Točak. 


WHAT WE NEED?



Thank You!

As you can tell we are very passionate about this project that with your support we can turn into reality. Some of the cool things that you will receive depending on your donation level are just added value to the fact that we will fulfill many young artist's dreams by providing affordable infrastructure to pursue their music dreams. 

From all of us at Mad House Project, we thank you!

story:
My name is Amarachi Bintu Utah, 18, songwriter and rap music artiste. I grew up in Aba, a city in the southeast of Nigeria. When I first left my hometown for New Jersey, I knew I had finally gotten the opportunity I desired to showcase my talent to the world and to do want I have always wanted to do- create music. I just really wanna get out there, be that inspiration to the world and create music to move you, shake you, give you some joy and make you feel good.

 

I would like to ask that you consider supporting me meet the financial costs of my planned EP which consists of 6 singles. Rather than go the way of the majority of upcoming music artistes, more interested in of-the-moment singles, I am working on a well-thought-out body of work and putting in the effort to release a richly-executed debut EP having six songs, 2 will be made into music videos. I am fiercely independent and don't want to be signed on under any record label until I can dictate my terms.

As a sponsor, not only will your donation help to make this production a success, you will be pushing me to achieve my dream. This set of six songs selected out of a huge catalog of songs that I would love to share with you, holds untold stories that you'l love to hear!

Truth is, I need your help. All year long, I've been listening to feedback from my audience and fans, and it kept coming back to the same thing: 'you need to record your music'

So I am really excited to finally be bringing you my debut EP.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

AUDIO PRODUCTION COSTS.

Studio recording of the 6 tracks EP at Front Row Seat Productions, LLC. New Jersey,
Studio time
Tracking
Arranging
Mixing
Mastering
Graphics and Music Art.        
$2,500

 

VIDEO PRODUCTION COSTS.

2 videos directed by New York city based Akorede Alli, Cinematographer SVA NYC
and  Unlimited L.A
Video production
Editing
Models
Location
$6,000

 

EP RELEASE (AUDIO/VIDEO) PROMOTIONS            

$7,010

 

TOTAL PROJECT COST

$15,520 USD

 

We will be giving out unique Miya B branded Mechanize (Hand-bands, scarves, Tee-Shirts etc) to our contributors to show appreciation for your support.

 

The Impact

My amateur recorded music videos are critically acclaimed with views on social media running into hundreds of thousands. I also recently won $600 at the Gennisit Talent Show (Rap Week), a Social Media Talent Show.

Your contribution will enable me record at a proper studio and turn out professional music for greater impact to a wider audience.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just about any support to this project would mean the world to me. If you can't contribute, that's okay! I'm still glad you're here. Please help out by sharing this campaign to get the word out. Thank you for believing in me!

story:
Nuestra historia

Creada y dirigida por el maestro Daniel Diaz Ortega, violinista, arreglista y compositor de formación clásica, la REAL CHARANGA nace en marzo del 2003. Sus 13 años y 5 trabajos discográficos son muestra de la iniciativa vanguardista de su visión musical, pasando por los festivales y escenarios mas representativos de Colombia y ganando el reconocimiento nacional e internacional a su impecable trabajo musical.

Gracias a su versatilidad, a la calidad interpretativa de sus músicos, a los arreglos originales de temas de tradición afro-antillana lo que ha llevado a la REAL CHARANGA a estar en el top de las mejores propuestas musicales de Colombia y a ser un referente obligado de la salsa capitalina.

No todas las orquestas pueden darse el lujo de nadar entre dos aguas, aunque este es el caso de la REAL CHARANGA, quienes han demostrado a través de su trayectoria el dominio de géneros como la salsa, el jazz y la música clásica.

Ganadores del XXVIII Festival internacional de jazz del teatro libre 2016, invitados especiales al Rio Jazz Night Fest 2016 y ganadores del festival Jazz al Parque 2015, son algunos de sus mas recientes logros. Han compartido escenario con grandes músicos como Wayne Shorter, Esperanza Spalding, Courtney Pine, Henry Butler, Steven Bernstein, Groove Collective & Jay Rodriguez y Pedrito Martinez entre otros. También ganadores al mejor tema inédito por "Relato en 5" en el festival jazz al Parque 2007, ganadores como mejor Orquesta del Festival Salsa al Parque en las versiones 2005, 2006 y 2007 e invitados de honor cerrando las versiones del 2009 y 2012 con una asistencia de mas de 70.000 personas.

“REAL GROOVE" trabajo discográfico con el que conmemoraron sus 12 años de trayectoria, es una apuesta a un sonido internacional donde el acid jazz, el latin jazz y el Funk se mezclan entre Cumbias y Currulaos con el estilo característico que les ha sido merecedores a los mejores comentarios de la prensa especializada y del aval de sus seguidores. Actualmente la REAL Charanga se encuentra en pre-producción de su sexto trabajo “R-Evolution” a grabarse en los estudios de Audiovision, patrocinado por Tigo Music Colombia en el mes de Diciembre de 2016. 

Campaña R-EVOLUTION

Es importante para nosotros hacer esta campaña pues el propósito es lograr tener los recursos económicos para hacer el prensaje de nuestro álbum, como también hacer el lanzamiento de este el cual se hará en el Teatro Libre de la ciudad de Bogotá. 

Con este trabajo estamos apostando en lograr hacer una gira nacional y estar en grandes festivales donde podamos hacer conocer la música que estamos haciendo y lo que esta sucediendo musicalmente con la REAL, de igual manera sabiendo toda esa energía que metimos en este álbum queremos presentarnos a los Grammy latinos pues vemos que este sexto trabajo tuvo una gran calidad, como en la parte musical, grabación, mezcla,  masterización y producción.

 Por que tu ayuda es importante?
 

Este sexto trabajo fue grabado en los estudios de Audiovision y respaldado por TigoMusic Colombia, como también por el productor musical Juan Carlos “chato” Rivas, y como ingenieros Francisco Kiko Casto en la captura, Daniel Bustos en la mezcla y Camilo Silva en la masterizacion del álbum R-EVOLUTION. Con tu apoyo y tu aporte financiero, la REAL CHARANGA podrá realizar el prensaje (copias) de su trabajo discográfico, hacer la producción de su lanzamiento, la promoción de este sexto trabajo y una gira promocional. Para esto esperamos recaudar US 10.000 ¿te gustaría ser parte de este maravilloso sueño?

Si tienes algún inconveniente para realizar tu contribución por este medio, bien sea porque no tienes tarjeta de crédito, no quieres usarla aquí, tu banco no aprueba el pago, u otra razón, por favor contáctanos al correo realcharanga@gmail.com, diazdaniel77@gmail.com,  para indicarte cómo podemos recibir tu aporte de otra manera.

 Que tendrás para ti...

Con tu apoyo y el estar al lado de este proyecto obtendrás el álbum online o en físico autografiado por todo los integrantes de la REAL,.. pero si tu apoyo es mayor, podrás tener el ultimo trabajo como también los trabajos anteriores obviamente autografiados, ademas de un mayor apoyo tendrás tickets para el lanzamiento. Si te enloqueces por la Real, te podemos invitar al ensayo general el cual será exclusivo para amigos y para ti. Pero mucho mejor, si este apoyo es completamente brutal tendrás un concierto con los músicos de la REAL, una noche maravillosa llena de jazz y mucha salsa.  

Otra forma de apoyarnos...

Si ves que no puedes apoyarnos de una forma económica, no importa, puedes ayudarnos compartiendo esta información a tus conocidos, amigos, personas que estén interesadas en respaldar y apoyar la música que estamos elaborando, recuerda que al compartir esto es aumentar las posibilidades que este gran proyecto musical se convierta en realidad. 

Mas información 

 • FestivalInternacionaldeJazzdelTeatroLibre/2016
• FestivalRioJazzNight–Monteria/2016
• JazzalParque20años/2015
• Invitados,FestivaldeBluesyJazzdelalibéluladorada/2015.
• lanzamiento quinta producción “REALGROOVE” y aniversario 12 años Teatro Colsubsidio /2015.
• ConciertoGanadoresconvocatoriaFundaciónGilbertoálzateAvendaño/2014.
• ConciertosdenavidadIDARTES/2014.
• Celebraciónaniversario10años-Casaquiebracanto/2013.
• Lanzamientocuartaproducción“CHARANGANAVIDAD”Diciembre/2012.
• ConciertoGanadoresconvocatoriaFundaciónGilbertoálzateAvendaño/2012.
• Invitadosespeciales15añosSalsaalParque/2012.
• FestivalBulesyJazzdelaLibéluladorada/2012.
• Lanzamientoterceraproducción“ALACAMERANGA”marzo1012.
• Concierto“AlaCameranga”TeatroAmericano/2011.
• AniversarioBoogaloop/2011.
• FestivaldebluesyjazzdelaLibélulaDorada/2010.
• FestivaldebluesyjazzdelaLibélulaDorada/2009.
• Invitadossalsaalparque/2009.
• InvitadosConlaparticipacióndeJayRodríguezyGrooveCollective/2009.
• FestivalBulesyJazzdelaLibéluladorada/2008.
• FestivaliberoamericanodeteatrodeBogotá/2008.
• Lanzamientosegundaproducción“Charangacapital”/2008.
• GanadoresmejortemainéditoFestivaljazzalparque/2007.
• InvitadossalsaalParque/2007.
• FeriadeManizales/2007.
• FestivalnuevasmúsicasColombianas/2006.
• ConciertofundaciónGilbertoÁlzateAvendaño/2006.
• SegundoaniversariodelgrupodedanzasdelauniversidadDistrital/2006.
• Festivalsalsaalparque/2006.
• FestivaliberoamericanodeteatrodeBogotá/2006.
• Lanzamientoprimeraproducción“REALCHARANGA”/2006. • Festivalsalsaalparque/2005.
• ConciertoTeatroJorgeEliecerGaitán/2005.
