story:
When I was sick with Lyme's Disease. Fighting for my life. I walked into my darkest shadows to find my own light. Fighting this inner battle. This inner balance. Between  my shadow self and finding my light within. This experience of not giving up the fight. To win the race called life. When I felt like I was falling apart. Falling into one million pieces. This was the hardest thing I have ever experienced. And in this inner fight. I found this inner fire. The more I got back up after falling apart inwards. I found more and more light within. When I was physically drained. I looked inwards and found this passion. This burning in my heart. To keep going no matter what. This inner fire began to spread to every part of my experience. Of my every part of my physical being. Letting go of the inner physical pain. Releasing the emotional pain and allowing that fire to burn down everything that was there. Watching this pain and suffering burn away to ashes. This flame of love. Overcoming the suffering and feeling the Sunshine on my shoulders. Feeling that warmth like it was the first time. "Like I can count on you like I count on the sun and I will rest in you like I rest in the sun. To burn that Lyme's Disease away. To become my full authentic self. Was the hardest battle. But the most amazing and beautiful experience ever. This "Fire Dance Project" is sharing this experience through music, dance, expression through words and movement. This project is a two hour show/production. That Kopo Magic has experienced fully. Using his passion as a composer and producer. Singer/songwriter and musician and the world of magic. The world of imagination and magic. Kopo Magic will be sharing his story and experiences through "Fire Dance".  

 

 

1- $10 download the "I Believe in Love" album.

2- $25 Celebration Concert

July 27th 7pm at the So Hum Home 2274 South Lake Street SLC UT 84106

3- $50 Harp Meditation

4- $100 a private sound healing session

5- $500 a personal song Kopo will write a song and record it for you...

story:
Featuring, in total, 35 of the best Canadian musicians and singers. From the astonishing 13 year-old Rashita Barua to the world-renowned Guido Basso, now in his 8th decade, “Love Songs & Lullabies” brings together performers from the world of jazz, blues, gospel and world music.

It is totally unique and the album is on its way!

Here's where you come in.
 

I need you to become part of the imaJJine naTTion!

imaJJine’s “Love Songs & Lullabies is an album that is based in jazz but incorporates, blues, gospel, and a little bit of soul! Melodic, cerebral, uplifting and accessible, it will make you smile, cry, relax and dance. Tranquil and powerful it’s set to spread worldwide.

Completing a project of this magnitude on this level for an independent artist requires an enormous amount of time, dedication, perseverance  and financial investment.

A grant from the Ontario Arts Council got the project started. I have continued to finance it myself. But, as I move into the final stages of production, recording, mixing, mastering, album design, video, printing, and promotion I am looking to raise money to cover the final costs with the goal of completing the album to the same high standard as I started. Please know that absolutely every gesture towards helping me reach these goals even if it just means spreading the word about the campaign and/or sharing the music with friends means the world to me.

What I Need & What You Get

The cost to complete the album is going to be around $10,000

There will be numerous perks for participating in this campaign including signed advance copies  of CD’s, T-shirts, mugs, eBooks, posters, private live acoustic listening parties, and more.

I'll also be sharing news during the campaign, including "sneak-peak" listens of some of  the final mixes!

Other Ways You Can Help

This campaign is about music, and I'm here to make this music reach the world. Even if you can't contribute financially, that doesn't mean you can't be a really important contributor to this project. I would really appreciate it if you would share this campaign. Social media, email lists, tell your friends. I need YOU to help make this happen. So don't worry if you can't contribute, someone you know might be able to and will definitely want to because they’ll love the music and love the opportunity to help bring this project to fruition.

So spread the word, and thanks in advance for your contributions.

Sincerely,

Keith Whiting

story:
The Post Venue

This music venue is a place for local and non-local music lovers to experience the new music of Nashville and will be registered under the name The Post Venue. The Post Venue will be co-owned by Brianna N. a Music Business Professional with an ear for music and Peyton E. a long time Hospitality Professional. The venue will offer a variety of genres in the comfort of a welcoming and entertaining environment.

The contributions will help us lock down a location in the heart of East Nashville TN.

What We Need & What You Get

The funds our contributors donate to help us reach our goal will go towards obtaining the first month, last month, and security deposit for our location.

 

All donations received can get you some of our cool merch items. Even a FREE SHOW? Even if we don't reach our goal, will go towards anything from sound gear to renovations.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't feel bad if you can't donate. There are plenty of ways to help! Follow us on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. Share our posts with all your friends! Check out our Website Here!

 

We look forward to seeing you all at The Post Venue!

story:
Breve resumen

Desde los tres años he trabajado mi voz con mucho amor y disciplina, al mismo tiempo que he adelantado en mis estudios.

Actualmente curso V semestre de Comunicación Social y he grabado más de 40  temas musicales. Participé en La Voz Teens de Caracol Televisión. He sido ganadora de dos certámenes nacionales en la modalidad canción inédita. Y obtuve el primer puesto en un concurso internacional en la ciudad de México.

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

Necesito tu colaboración para invertir en mi proyecto, el cual está conformado así: 

10% para la grabación del tema

20% para la realización del video 

70% para promoción (CD´s, redes sociales, prensa, televisión, radio, catálogo y presentaciones en vivo) 

 

El impacto

El sueño de todo artista es trascender, pero se requiere de apoyo tanto de las personas, como de los medios de comunicación, y esto implica gastos en desplazamientos, manutención, promoción y más.

La música hace parte del ser humano. Mis temas contienen un mensaje que logra conectar a través de múltiples sentimientos, lo que hace esto posible, es que para mí la música no es un hobbie. Es mi proyecto de vida.

 

Riesgos y Desafíos

En estos 15 años de carrera musical he tocado muchas puertas, he hablado con demasiadas personas, he tenido al rededor de 200 entrevistas en radio y más de 50 en televisión, no ha sido nada fácil. Aunque me han repetido mil veces que es imposible, pero yo sigo trabajando para lograrlo porque lo estoy haciendo posible.

Esta modalidad de financiamiento es una gran oportunidad que quiero aprovechar. Conozco muchos casos de personas que como tú, apoyan el talento y creen en la juventud. 

 

Puedes ayudar de otras formas

Si tu colaboración no es monetaria, ayúdame a compartir esta campaña con personas o instituciones que creas que puedan hacerlo.

Visita mis redes sociales y dale mucho amor a mis temas 

Instagram: @natylamarquezmusic

YouTube: Naty Lamarquéz

Facebook: Naty Lamarquéz Music

story:
About the band

The band members are also part of some other Serbian, American and international projects,
such as The Black Heart Procession, The Red Step, Kazna za uši, Presing, NBG and others.

  • Margareta Samoran - vocal
  • Boris Eftovski - piano
  • Vladimir Krakov - guitar
  • Rudolf Cibulski - bass
  • Vladimir Markoski - drums


We are a group of big music lovers and music is an escape from the everyday problems and
difficulties we all sometimes fall into. But music is not just that for us. Music is a way of life, a
way of communicating with other people, and a way of sharing emotions. With our music, we
want to communicate with people all over the globe and hope that someone will be touched
our lyrics and chords.

 

Studio

Down There Studio is a professional audio recording studio where vintage gear meets modern, and where vintage and modern gear blend together. All our songs will be recorded on analog equipment such as Fender guitars, amps and piano. The owner of the studio and our producer is Uroš Milikić, young and talented guy, who has been working with all of us for a long time.

 

Thanks!

We would appreciate your generous support very much!

By supporting our project you will contribute to a better and richer sound and participate in
something that is very important to us.

story:
Kenneth "Kenny" Tomlin

I am an Independent Artist who aspires to continue to make real music that changes peoples lives for the better.  I have been writing music for almost 40 years and performing for 35 years. Recently I have started recording and releasing my music and the feedback has been wonderful. My goal is continue to record, release, market and perform my music. Currently my #1 song that the public likes is We Betta Than Nis which is a song that is relevant today due to the upcoming 2020 elections. Here is a YouTube link to the song: https://youtu.be/jq0p1eIqVOs

I need funding for studio time, releasing music, running the website, getting CD's made, paying for raidio airplay, streaming services, promotion as well as live performances showcasing my talent. I have been told as an artist I fit into my own genre, R&B Gospel Truth. I have songs like Never Put Your Hands on A Woman that speaks about domestic abuse. I would like to get this song to Battered Women Shelters. I have a song I am working to try and release called Git Yo Givin' On that speaks on giving to those in need. I have many other songs like this that I know will change peoples lives for the better. Real music is what I want to continue to put out for all ages across the board.  Visit my Website to see more: https://www.kennytomlinmusic.com/

I have been told as an artist I fit into my own genre, R&B Gospel Truth. I have songs like Never Put Your Hands on A Woman that speaks about domestic abuse. I would like to get this song to Battered Women Shelters. I have a song I am working to try and release called Git Yo Givin' On that speaks on giving to those in need. I have many other songs like this that I know will change peoples lives for the better. Real music is what I want to continue to put out for all ages across the board.  Visit my Website to see more: https://www.kennytomlinmusic.com/

story:
Intro

Gigui is an application to assist musicians in live performances. My name is Michael - I currently run a startup in Baltimore, Maryland, but, more to the point, I'm a guitarist for the Trust Funk Kids. My recent experience performing live music was the motivation for Gigui, a tool for musicians who may use a variety of effects and pedals in live performances. It can be difficult to remember settings for each song in a long set, and it slows down the performance when you are constantly fiddling with pedals and effects.

And so I started designing cheat sheets (slides in a PowerPoint presentation) for each song our band played. These slides contained useful information like which channel on my amp and which pedals I used, the settings for those pedals, and any hints about the song itself, including lyrics and chord progressions. After several friends and fellow musicians asked me which app I was using to keep track of the songs, it dawned on me that this was a perfect opportunity to combine my entrepreneurial experience and mindset with my favorite hobby. And so I'm asking you to contribute to my first crowd funded project - an application to assist performing musicians in managing large set lists.

How It Works

  1. Create a new song card (title, artist, etc)
  2. Specify channel, effects, and pedals used in the song
  3. Specify setting for effects and pedals
  4. Add notes like lyrics, chord progressions, key changes, etc.
  5. Save the card and add it to a set list
  6. Export the set list and view it on your mobile device
  7. Get ready for the smoothest live performance of your life!

The design will allow users to create customizable cheat sheets for each song in a set. The song card will include:

  • Channel selection
  • Effects and pedal settings
  • Chord progression
  • Customizable notes or hints, including lyrics
This phase is really meant to define what would make the most impactful application. Other problems I might focus on:
  • Paper set lists and lyrics - hard to see, can't scroll - they're a thing of the past
  • Sharing and editing set lists with band members

What We Need & What You Get

Initially, I'm raising $500 to pay for a few important preliminaries: 

  • User feedback in the form of surveys and interviews to determine the most important features of a minimally viable product
  • Design and mockups of the framework of the minimally viable product - an application geared towards guitarists (as a first step) and focused on managing effects and pedal settings for long set lists
If you contribute $5 or more, you'll receive a Gigui sticker - and of course the satisfaction of contributing to a sure-to-be-awesome project! If I don't raise the target of $500 within 60 days, your contribution will be refunded. 

The Impact

Along with 2 cofounders, I've been running my own startup for 2 years now. I know the importance of fully understanding a problem from a user's perspective before beginning to build a solution. Your contribution will go a long way in enabling the research necessary to define the user needs, design criteria, and the minimally viable product (MVP). If successful, the next round will focus on delivering that MVP to all of you musicians out there!

Risks & Challenges

There are of course risks with any project. However, my aim is to approach this from a needs finding perspective. Right now, the greatest risk may be that I don't fully understand the need, or that the solution as I envision it doesn't actually address many musicians' pain points. And so, this first round of funding is aimed at mitigating those risks.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to the campaign, that's alright! You can still express your support by sharing a link to the campaign on your favorite social network, telling any musicians you know about it, or providing feedback on the project. 


Cheers,

Michael

story:
The Orchestra

The Simon Bolivar Sinfonietta (SBS) consists of young Venezuelan musicians who began their musical journey in the renowned “El Sistema” program before venturing further afield to study in prestigious universities and conservatoires in Europe. As a player led orchestra, without a principal conductor, the Sinfonietta sees themselves as a family where teamwork and passion are their key principals.

 

The Simon Bolivar Sinfonietta’s vision is to be innovative, flexible and wide reaching, enabling them to compete within the international music scene. Through their performances they hope to reinvent the traditional classical concert, bringing new perspectives and above all exploring ways to strengthen the audiences’ connection with the music. In order to achieve this, the orchestra will perform in spaces beyond the traditional concert hall, taking their music to public spaces such as art galleries and outdoor venues. Alongside this they will explore cross-arts collaboration, linking their music with the visual arts, dance, drama and literature. Due to their background in “El Sistema” the Sinfonietta feels a high commitment in terms of social responsibility – they aim to develop an outreach program alongside their performances, creating links with schools, trusts and other institutions to create a network that attracts young people to music.

 

The orchestra consists of 35 musicians in total. In line with their vision of flexibility and innovation, the orchestra can perform in anything from 2-35 players depending on the project, adapting to the size of the venue and style of music. Through developing a strong relationship with their audience the Simon Bolivar Sinfonietta wants to show that art can truly transform the human begin, taking them away from everyday worries and enriching their lives.

 

Simon Bolivar Sinfonietta will have their debut in the Trame Sonore Festival in Mantova in June 2017. In the future they will program concerts throughout Europe, including countries such as Germany, France, Italy and Belgium.

The Festival

Trame Sonore is a chamber music festival placed in the City of Mantova, Italy. The festival hosts around two hundred musicians of international renown, they perform concerts in venues all over the city including Palazzo Te, Palazzo Ducale, Basilica di Sant’andrea and Teatro Bibiena.

The opening concert of the festival will be a joint concert with La Orchestra de Camera di Mantova and the Simon Bolivar Sinfonietta. In this outdoor concert the orchestras will join to perform Beethoven’s fifth symphony.

For more information on the festival please see the website: http://www.mantovachamber.com/

 

The Concerts

During the 2017 Trame Sonore festival the Simon Bolivar Orchestra will be a highlight of the festival, with their main concert in the Teatro Bibiena on the 2nd of June, at 4pm. The programs will include –

1) Concert 31/05/2017

L.V. Beethoven          Symphony N° 5  op. 67 in C minor

Simon Bolivar Sinfonieta (SBS) and Orchesta di Camera di Mantova (OCM)

2) Concert  02/06/2017 Teatro Bibiena 16:00 h.

L.V. Beethoven                   Symphony N° 7  op  92 in A Major

Simon Bolivar Sinfonieta

 

Budget

In order for the Simon Bolivar Sinfonietta to attend the festival, they require to raise approx. €16,800. They hope to raise this amount from sponsors and other diverse institutions.

 

Accommodation

ABC of Mantova (triple rooms, breakfast included)

35 x €35 per night, 8 nights

€9800

Meals

Breakfast provided by hotel, lunch and dinner provided by festival

Travel Expenses

Flight or train dependent on individual situation, estimated at €200 per person, totalling €7000

Total budget

€9800 + €7000 = €16800

story:
Richard Liston for NC Governor

Hello NC! I've been a professional musician in NC and in NYC, a software engineer at Data General in Research Triangle Park, NC, a cab driver in Asheville, and now I'm entering politics. My first experience in politics was as a candidate for Asheville City Council in 2015. I didn't win, but I learned a lot. For one thing, a solid campaign manager is essential. If I raise the funds, I'll interview some individuals (I have some in mind) and pay them for the first six months with funds from this IndieGogo campaign after I file the Notice of Candidacy. After that, if they're competent, we'll raise enough money to get them paid for the remainder of the campaign.

What we need:

Our goal is $20,000. The cost of filing a Notice of Candidacy is $1,474, 1% of the Governor's salary (too high, in my opinion). We'll also need to hire a campaign manager at a cost of approximately $18,000 for the first 6 months of the campaign. I don't have that laying around, so I'm asking you to help by pledging some small amount of money and, very importantly, sharing this on Facebook, Twitter, and anywhere else you like, and also talking about it to people.

What you'll get:

It's pretty simple: if I raise enough money, you'll get one smart, caring individual on the ballot who will do his best to run an excellent campaign, and a campaign manager to handle the details. And we'll regularly update you on our progress, probably by releasing YouTube videos. That's it. I mean, I certainly hope that's enough !

My platform:

I used to call myself a Democrat, but now I see the whole Democrat/Republican, Conservative/Liberal fight as a waste of time and energy that divides good people and keeps us from moving forward together. Both sides have good points. Both sides have bad points. I don't want to fight. It's just not fun. But I'll fight if I have to because I'm tired of watching what we're doing to ourselves. I want to have respectful conversations with people of differing opinions, find common ground and implement creative solutions to our problems. Musicians do this, so politicians can, too. I want to make sure we introduce good laws and get bad laws off the books. You lawyers out there know there are some pretty bad laws on the books that are constraining our residents and our communities from being able to live the lives we deserve.

The primary issue that concerns me is that so many people know that the United States educational system is woefully inadequate. It is my goal for North Carolina to lead the way in providing excellent education in the United States. If we can do this, so many other problems will be solved.

If we exceed the goal:

This is an ALL OR NOTHING campaign (like Kickstarter). I only get the funds if we reach the goal. Any funds we raise over the $20,000 goal will go to the Sphere College Project's fundraising campaign at gofundme.com/sphere.

So... all of you musicians and software engineers who have been frustrated for so long with how things are being run, whether you're a Democrat or Republican or (like me) Independent, please consider pledging enough money for us to find out exactly how far a highly educated, caring person who isn't afraid to speak truth can go.

Other Ways You Can Help

Maybe you don't have funds to contribute right now. That's ok, you can help by talking about this campaign and sharing it on various social networking sites. Let's get the word out!

Thanks!

Richard Liston

42 Evelake Drive

Asheville, NC 28806

story:
Dear Bono,

 In 2009 I´ve asked you for a Job while I was in Dublin:

36 Days To Work For U2

6 Years Later I´m still asking you for a Job. ​ Make my Christmas Wish come true Bono. Let Me Work For You Too.

www.OneWishForChristmasBono.com

What?

I´m asking BONO, lead singer of the well known band U2 for a Job.

In 2009 I´ve sold everything I had except my Guitar and my Computer and wen to live in Dublin, Ireland.

I wen´t to Dublin to try to get a Record Deal for my album "Hodling All These Empty Letters".

While I was living in Ireland I went to hear my favorite band (U2) to Cork Park. The hole world went to Ireland to hear them as It ads a special felling to hear "the Boys" playing home.

That show blew my mind away as a musican and as a fan, so I posted on my facebook.

A radio presenter of Country Mix F.M. read my story on Facebook and invited me to play live on the radio.

She has interview U2 many times and for my was an honur to be able to sing live for Ireland my songs and U2 covers.

When I the radio show was ending I said "One More Thing Lindsay", I wan´t to work for U2. I don´t care if I have to carry boxes in a storage or prepare coffe. I wan´t to fork for them so I can learn everything about recording, touring, A&R, etc so I can get my own record deal and tour with my band. I give myself 36 days to work for U2".

And this is what I did:

36 Days To Work For U2 - Part 1

36 Days To Work For U2 - Part 2

36 Days To Work For U2 - Part 3

Unfortunaly U2 whas on 360 tour at the moment and allthough one radio tried to put as in touch live while day were inteviewing me for the radio they couldn´t reach them. They were on tour and they were very busy.

2015

One Wish For Chrismas BONO

While I´m writing this (12 of november) there are 42 days left to Chrismas and I´m asking BONO a Christmas Wish.

I´m asking BONO to work for U2.

Why?

They asked me a many, many times why I want to Work For U2 along this long 6 years

To put it simple, 

If you were a Tecnology Entrepreneur you would give anything to do your MBA in the MIT or in Silycon Valley.

 And your DREAM come true would be to work for Bill Gates, Woz, or to had met Steve Jobs.

 If you love money and you stuided Economy, you would give anything  to work for Warren.

I´m a Musican and I want to record my album (Holding All These Empty Letters) and tour arround the world.

 To do that I need to learn a lot about recording, A&R, Touring, etc

. Working for BONO and U2, would be an MBA for a musican.

When?

I´need to raise 1.900 euros to do a Marketing Campaing  in 30 days so I can spread the word to as reach as many journalist as I can with my story so they can help me get my message to BONO and U2 before Christmas.

How?

I´m a Singer, Vocal Coach but also an Entrepreneur and Marketing Specialist. My two pasions are Music & Marketing.

I´m director of a Digtal Agency wich I´ve founded on 2014 and we  specialize on Digital Campaings and Online Advertaising (S.E.O , S.E.M. , Socail Media, Web Design, Graphic Design, Apps,etc).

I have a PHD on marketing and I´m really good on Online Advertaising and Social Media Strategy, so I´m confident that with 1.900 and Journalists Help I can get my story to BONO and U2.

For What Do I need 1.900 Euros?

For My Marketing Campaign

I ll be advertaising with, text, Display, Audio and Video on:

SOCIAL MEDIA:

-------------------------------------

Google Adwords:

Google Adwords Search

Google Adwords Display

Google Adwords Video

Google Adwords Mobile

---------------------------------------

Facebook:

Post Promoted

Display

Video

Retargeting till Christmas

------------------------------------------

Instagram:

Display

Retargeting till Christmas

--------------------------------------------

Twitter

Promoted Tweet

Tweet with Image

Tweet with Video

Tweet Search

Retargeting till Christmas

-------------------------------------------

LinkedIn

Promoted Post

Online Ad

Target 1 : Job title : Journalist

Target 2: People who work in: CNN, NBC, FOX, REUTERS, BBC, New York Times, Wasinghtong Post, Irish Times, The Star, Country Mix Fm, Dublin FM, etc, etc

Snaptchat 

Ask for free Video Advert

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Radio:

Spotyfy :

Audio Add

Irish Radios

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NewsPaper:

The New York Times

The Irish Times

Send my story

RTE

Etc, etc

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dear investors,

Help me fund my proyect so I can send my wish to BONO´s and U2 ears.

Any question you have you can reach me at:

Federico Revello

Phone

Phone 1: Mobile: +595 95 378 444

Phone 2: Global: +1 (315) 371-4542

Mail

mail 1 : federico@federicorevello.com

mail 2 : federicorevello@gmail.com

Website (you can chat with me online - web chat):

www.OneWishForChristmasBONO.com

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Social Networks Federico Revello:

Thank You!

MERRY CHRISTMAS !!!!

story:
Short Summary

One in a Million Concert Featuring Annor Doeman

  • I'm a new artist from Los Angeles CA, and I've been singing for as long as I can remember.
  • This campaign is an opportunity to raise awareness and support for my first singing show and it's important to me because this will be the first time I'll be on a stage doing an official full show.
  • Contributors will help me to achieve my dreams of performing my first full singing show on stage.
  • My first concert will take place on Thursday, August 31st, 2017.

Ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break down in more detail:

  • Ideally I'd like to raise $5,000.00 in order to get great:
  • Staging design
  • Lighting
  • Hair/Make-up/Wardrobe
  • Licensing of up to 10 cover songs
  • Dancers/Guest Artists
  • Concession Stand during the show
  • Concession Stand Operator
  • Ticket Greeter
  • Merch during the show (T-shirts, Posters, Postcards, Stickers, Key chains, etc)
  • Live Musicians or/ and Sound Technicians
  • Camera operators to film the show
  • Still photographer to take pictures during the show
  • DIT, Digital Footage Controller, and downloader
  • Advertising
  • Cover the cost of renting the venue
  • Renting of practice space before the show

 

I sing jazz, blues, pop Latin, and R&B and rap music. I play a little keyboard, guitar, drums and I'm also a songwriter. It will be awesome debuting some of my original songs for you on stage! And I can't wait to play the keyboard, and guitar for you onstage during my first show! I love to dance to Michael Jackson, Usher, Beyonce, and Justin Timberlake, and I look forward to dancing and showing just how much I've learned from my idols! I'm an entertainer at heart, and many people tell me I was meant to entertain on the stage! I'm very grateful to have won awards awards for my singing and I look forward to perform for you during my show!

I'll be performing my original songs, and cover songs!

Whenever you contribute $10.00 or you will receive a ticket  to my show and a free download to my latest hit, "One in a Million" which is now on I-Tunes, and CDBaby.com! You'll also receive a digital downloadable copy of filmed footage from my first show!

In addition, you'll receive the great satisfaction of knowing that you've helped a new, beginning artist make her dreams come true of performing her first singing show on stage!

  • Even if I don't reach my entire goal, the show must go on. The show will still happen! The funds will be used for venue rental cost, getting a great camera man, lighting, sound technician, and on set photographer. After this order of importance is in the list from above.

The Impact

Here is the difference your contribution will make:

  • Love great music? Excellent entertainment? Feeling great?! Smiling? When you contribute you add to the feel good feeling that automatically comes with a musical concert, and these good vibrations also are sent off and influence the whole world to feel good! sends off, and Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • I've won awards, and receive many accolades when I'm onstage.
  • This is my very first crowd funding campaign.
  • I love to dance and sing, and have done it alot in practice, at home, in a studio, and this will be the first time I combine all of the talents and skills that I've learned and put them on stage!

Risks & Challenges

There are risks and obstacles which I may face in achieving my goal. I may not get the venue that I want, the cover song licenses for the songs I'd most like to perform, or the recording of the concert the exact way I want. However:

  • I am a hard worker, and will work hard to overcome these obstacles and to put on an amazing show!
  • We will also go out of our way to make sure  you have an amazing concert going experience from check-in to the final moment of our show. We will also be recording the show.

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help!

  • Get the word out and make some noise about my campaign!
  • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
What is Jaytraxx?

Jaytraxx is a music streaming service that includes and supports independent artists. You'll find all the chart-toppers and all the up-and-coming bands in one app. Jaytraxx makes it easy to discover brand new music that you've never heard before, and also makes it easier for Independent bands and artists to have their music heard by the world.


Community comes before the labels

More and more we're seeing the music industry dominated and controlled by money-hungry labels that control the charts and therefore control what you hear, however Jaytraxx puts the power right into the hands of the community. All your favourite artists are still there, but indie artists are right there on the homepage ready to be discovered, whether they have a record deal or not*


What it looks like

We've been designing Jaytraxx for over 18 months, making sure the details are ironed out and picture perfect


Among more over at www.jaytraxx.com

What makes Jaytraxx so great?

Apart from it's community music focus, Jaytraxx is packed with fun and useful features that will transform how you listen to music
- Want to share a playlist/album/song with a friend? Just open up whatever you want to share and shake your phone to instantly send it
- Hear a great song on the radio or at a party and you want to save it for later? Open up Jaytraxx and turn your phone upside down, Jaytraxx will listen out for music and add it to your saved songs as soon as it recognizes
- Shake your phone on the search page and Jaytraxx will instantly play new music you'll like based on your listening history
- Save all of your playlists so you can listen later (even without an internet connection)

Why shouldn't I just use iTunes or Google Play?

iTunes and Google Play are great music stores, but with Jaytraxx you can listen to as much music as you want at a fraction of the price. Instead of buying an album or single you can stream it along with millions more and still support the artists, all for the equivalent of buying one album a month.


What platforms is it available for?

We want Jaytraxx to be possible from anywhere, that's why we're developing for a huge variety of devices:
- Windows + Mac + Linux
- iOS (iPad/iPhone incl. CarPlay)
- Android (Incl. Android TV, Android Auto, Android Wear & OUYA)
- Windows Phone + Windows 8/RT
- Xbox 360 / Xbox One (Proposed)
- LG + Samsung Smart TV
- Various in-car entertainment systems

And how much does it cost?

Jaytraxx is free for as long as you want it to be, however there are restrictions on free use. Here are our planned account tiers:
Jaytraxx Free ($0/month) - Unlimited Ad-supported streaming on PC, 2 hours/day ad-supported shuffle-only streaming on mobile/other
Jaytraxx Unlimited ($10.99/month) - Unlimited Ad-free streaming everywhere, download/save playlists for offline streaming


Why we need your help

We need the money to meet with developers and business experts to complete the development of Jaytraxx, all we need is $6000 to organize the meetings and accommodation and start development.


I can't really donate at the moment

No problem! Just make sure to spread the word about Jaytraxx, like our Facebook page and make sure to send this indiegogo campaign to your friends!

you can find us at

Our website: www.jaytraxx.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/jaytraxx


Questions? Contact us at hello@jaytraxx.com

story:
The Backstory....

As many of you know, I am Ruzz, Gretsch endorsed guitar slinger from Bristol UK. I started Ruzz Guitar's Blues Revue back in 2014 to enable me to play all the genres of music that I love that have come from the Blues, without restrictions. A lot has happened to date since I started the band including the birth of my dream line-up, a band with a killer Blues horn section. The support from all our friends since the start of this line-up has been fantastic and I can't thank you enough. Because of the support, we have decided to kick things up a gear for the next album and it's release party and we need your help!

Our Plan....

We are currently writing songs for the next "Big Band" album for which we are aiming to record with an increased horn section, think The Brian Setzer Orchestra and you'll be pretty close to the idea! Also planned for the album will be a few other instruments and some special guests... This is the next big push in my career, one step closer to my dream of having this line-up permanently.  With your help, it will enable us to make this a reality! 

There will be an album release party which we will record for a future live album release and we will unveil the increased band size for ONE NIGHT ONLY! 

What We Need & What You Get...

To enable us to do this, we're going to need as close to £10.000 as possible. This money will cover the costs of:

  • Studio Time 
  • Musician hire 
  • Venue hire for the release party 
  • Printing, Design, Promotion

In return for your generous donations we have listed various perks on this site to say a huge thank you to everyone for their continued support... these range from getting a copy of the album BEFORE it's release date, getting YOUR NAME in the album credits AND the credits for the Live album and a LIFETIME GUEST LIST pass to any show of your choosing.

The Impact

This is something I feel very passionate about, I feel that I have something different to offer to the music scene in this country with this band, the blending of Blues/R'n'B and Rockabilly with the "Big Band" horns. With your help, we can bring this sound to more people, create bigger and better shows, bigger and better future albums and much more!

Our friends and fans have been incredibly supportive already with this project, any help with this next step is very much appreciated! Even if we don't hit our target, all money donated by all of you will still go towards building up to this next level!

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can help us with this plan, 

  • Donate as much as you can afford
  • Share this page with your friends and spread the word of what we're doing
  • Share it to any Blues/R'n'B/Rockabilly groups on Facebook etc 

Thank you again for checking out this page and helping in any way you can!

Ruzz Evans

story:
WHO IS JEANA MARIE?

  • Jeana Marie is a Christian Minister of Music who resides in Chipley, FL (west of Tallahassee).

  • For over ten years she has dedicated her life and time assisting local pastors, volunteering in state-side missons, and facilitating recovery programs for victims of drugs and alcoholism in northwest Florida and northwest Georgia.

 

WHAT IS THIS CAMPAIGN?

  • This music project is a campaign for Jeana Marie's sophomore (second) album.
  • This will also act as the foundation to Jeana Marie Ministries: a work dedicated to creating music, cultivating worship, and women's outreach.

 

WHAT DO YOU NEED?

  • $7,500 is what we need and is the remaining cost of this project.
  • We're determined to reach our goal in 30 days or less.
  • With your help, Jeana Marie and her team can acquire the resources needed  to complete this project and start her outreach ministry.

 

WHERE DOES IT GO?

  • All funds will go towards the production costs of the album:
    • Studio Time & Producer
    • Recording, Mixing, and Mastering
    • Graphic Design Structure and Photography
    • Physical Album Copies and Project T-Shirts

 

WHO HAS PARTNERED WITH THIS CAMPAIGN?

  • Nick Coetzee: Owner and Producer at Rain Music Studios
  • RAINMUSIC.ORG

 

HOW ELSE CAN I HELP?

  • Use the Indegogo share tools.
  • Tell a friend or loved one about this campaign.
  • Like us on Facebook and share our page.
  • Watch, like and share our youtube video.

 

WHAT'S NEXT?

  • After this campaign Jeana Marie will travel to promote her sophomore album.
  • Money earned and donations received will be invested in other ongoing Jeana Marie ministry projects.

story:
The Go Go Cult are at a Halloween party in the 1970s. They become infatuated by a woman at the party. They do anything in their power to get her attention.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our creative ideas are all well and good, but these things cost money to make. We need your help to chip in whatever you can, to help make these exciting ideas come to life. We'll need a great location that will help to create the world within the video. We'll need a great crew who can capture the magic. And we'll need to keep everyone on set happy safe and healthy! 

 

 

Of course we need money to make it happen, but there are other ways that you can get your hands dirty to support the production!

Get the word out! Share the campaign amongst your friends, and encourage them to do the same. 

If you're free on the 20th January, and fancy a day on set, offer your time and help us while we shoot! Just email Natalie at nataliehodgins.co.uk.

story:
Moonraker Concert - SATURDAY 26TH JANUARY 2019

@ WYCOMBE SWAN, St Mary St, High Wycombe HP11 2XE
NOTE: DEADLINE TO PURCHASE TICKETS 6th May 2018!


PLEASE NOTE:
This is a method to sell tickets to you whilst minimising your risk. You are welcome to make donations, but the perks all include tickets and that is what it is all about!

This concert is not endorsed, sanctioned or associated with EON, Danjaq, the James Bond Films. No use of any footage or images from the film will be used during the performance. Performing Rights fees will be paid on the live performance as applicable.


ABOUT

The fact that you are even reading this means you are a fan. Well, I am too. I've been a James Bond fan since I was a boy and a John Barry / James Bond Music fan almost as long.

Luckily enough, as a Professional Trumpeter, I've got to play so many wonderful pieces and scores, but many of those amazing John Barry cues from the Bond films have eluded me as a performer, and you as a listener (in a live setting).

I want to right that wrong, and bring this one off opportunity to you: a live performance of the score with a huge 100 piece Symphony Orchestra and Choir.

Crowdfunding is not necessarily used in this way...but the idea is to use this platform to sell you tickets, without risk to me. Basically, if we don't sell enough tickets, the concert doesn't go ahead and you get refunded. Donations are welcome, but not expected at all.

Hopefully, if you haven't yet seen Q The Music, you will know about us at the very least. To summarise, I have given the last 14 years of my life, in between working as a full time Trumpeter, to a passion project: creating a James Bond Tribute Band & Concert that has delighted every Bond fan that has seen it. A bold statement: but go to our website at www.QTheMusicShow.com and check out the testimonials. No stone is left unturned with us, and the whole show from top to toe is done with a love of Bond that oozes through what we do, is second to NONE and delivered by some incredible musicians I have handpicked over the years.

Last year we were honoured to be chosen to play at dear Sir Roger Moore's Memorial Event at Pinewood Studios, having appeared at several Bond fan events in the past few years. If you are still not sure, try and speak to other Bond fans in Bond groups who have seen us - there are plenty who have now.

Now I desperately want to take our concerts a level up and do something that so many Bond fans have wanted, and asked me about over the years: a concert performance of every John Barry cue from Moonraker.

The size, scale and logistics of doing this are pretty huge, which is why I have not taken it on until now. For example, just the cost of the Orchestra and Arrangements for the night would be over £30,000, and then I have to factor in venue hire, PRS costs, VAT costs and all the other costs associated with concerts.

So, let me throw this back to you. How much do you Bond fans REALLY want it? 

I can do it. I can ABSOLUTELY give you this amazing concert we have all long craved.

If you all back it, I will have no problem in delivering the Concert you want and you (we!) deserve.

For those who don't know, my background is Orchestral. I come from a family steeped deep in that tradition, with my great-aunt Maisie, the first ever Professional Female Trombone player (in the Halle Orchestra) and my father Paul, who was Co-Principal Trumpet in both the BBC Symphony Orchestra and Royal Philharmonic Orchestra. He in fact worked with John Barry on at least one occasion, and those of you who own the "Moviola" recordings of Barry - my Dad plays the Trumpet solos on both The Specialist & Dances With Wolves.

Probably more importantly, I myself studied at one of the leading music conservatoires in the World: The Royal College Of Music in London, where I gained a music degree and was awarded the David Mason Trumpet prize (David Mason played The Beatles' Penny Lane Trumpet solo!). After graduating I freelanced in London with the English National Opera, BBC Symphony Orchestra and London Philharmonic Orchestra amongst others, before moving away from that scene but working as a full time Trumpeter.

My point with all this is to assure you, I have the skill, expertise, contacts, passion and experience to deliver this concert you deserve and want as Bond fans.

If successful in achieving the target, I will give every inch of my heart and soul to putting on a performance that you will NEVER forget...but you will need to be there on that night. It will not be recorded...and I suspect (bearing in mind it has never happened until now) this may be the one opportunity to see the music from that film performed in concert. 

The venue is lined up and very excited about the idea - I just need the backing from you now to confirm it and start the preparation for it.

It would be held at The Wycombe Swan (in High Wycombe, Berkshire) which holds over 1,000. 
The date of the concert would be Saturday 26th January 2019.

Venue Details: https://wycombeswan.co.uk/Online/


Please note: please do not make any travel or accommodation arrangements before funding is successful.

If funding IS successful, you will then be allocated your seat in the area you purchase with your backing pledge, or if you wish (for a small fee of £10) you can select your seat. I'm happy to try to work with you waive that fee if there is some flexibility in exactly the seat you want..I'm just trying to avoid 100 people demanding the same 2 seats!

If you are purchasing more than one ticket, please purchase them separately, and email us on thelondonshowband@hotmail.com to let us know which people to put together.

If we do not hit the target by the date stated (May 6th) any backers will be automatically refunded and the project will not go ahead.


So what are we waiting for? Let's get this show on the road. Most importantly, I cannot allocate a budget to advertising this. It is down to you - the Bond fans - to share this, and encourage your friends to pledge and come and see it. Due to the planning needed and the Indiegogo limitations, we now have 60 days to hit the target - a pretty huge target!

Just like the Moonraker knows, his dream may come true someday....
story_txt: Moonraker Concert - SATURDAY 26TH JANUARY 2019@ WYCOMBE SWAN, St Mary St, High Wycombe HP11 2XENOTE: DEADLINE TO PURCHASE TICKETS 6th May 2018!PLEASE NOTE:This is a method to sell tickets to you whilst minimising your risk. You are welcome to make donations, but the perks all include tickets and that is what it is all about!This concert is not endorsed, sanctioned or associated with EON, Danjaq, the James Bond Films. No use of any footage or images from the film will be used during the performance. Performing Rights fees will be paid on the live performance as applicable.ABOUTThe fact that you are even reading this means you are a fan. Well, I am too. I've been a James Bond fan since I was a boy and a John Barry / James Bond Music fan almost as long.Luckily enough, as a Professional Trumpeter, I've got to play so many wonderful pieces and scores, but many of those amazing John Barry cues from the Bond films have eluded me as a performer, and you as a listener (in a live setting).I want to right that wrong, and bring this one off opportunity to you: a live performance of the score with a huge 100 piece Symphony Orchestra and Choir.Crowdfunding is not necessarily used in this way...but the idea is to use this platform to sell you tickets, without risk to me. Basically, if we don't sell enough tickets, the concert doesn't go ahead and you get refunded. Donations are welcome, but not expected at all.Hopefully, if you haven't yet seen Q The Music, you will know about us at the very least. To summarise, I have given the last 14 years of my life, in between working as a full time Trumpeter, to a passion project: creating a James Bond Tribute Band & Concert that has delighted every Bond fan that has seen it. A bold statement: but go to our website at www.QTheMusicShow.com and check out the testimonials. No stone is left unturned with us, and the whole show from top to toe is done with a love of Bond that oozes through what we do, is second to NONE and delivered by some incredible musicians I have handpicked over the years.Last year we were honoured to be chosen to play at dear Sir Roger Moore's Memorial Event at Pinewood Studios, having appeared at several Bond fan events in the past few years. If you are still not sure, try and speak to other Bond fans in Bond groups who have seen us - there are plenty who have now.Now I desperately want to take our concerts a level up and do something that so many Bond fans have wanted, and asked me about over the years: a concert performance of every John Barry cue from Moonraker.The size, scale and logistics of doing this are pretty huge, which is why I have not taken it on until now. For example, just the cost of the Orchestra and Arrangements for the night would be over £30,000, and then I have to factor in venue hire, PRS costs, VAT costs and all the other costs associated with concerts.So, let me throw this back to you. How much do you Bond fans REALLY want it? I can do it. I can ABSOLUTELY give you this amazing concert we have all long craved.If you all back it, I will have no problem in delivering the Concert you want and you (we!) deserve.For those who don't know, my background is Orchestral. I come from a family steeped deep in that tradition, with my great-aunt Maisie, the first ever Professional Female Trombone player (in the Halle Orchestra) and my father Paul, who was Co-Principal Trumpet in both the BBC Symphony Orchestra and Royal Philharmonic Orchestra. He in fact worked with John Barry on at least one occasion, and those of you who own the "Moviola" recordings of Barry - my Dad plays the Trumpet solos on both The Specialist & Dances With Wolves.Probably more importantly, I myself studied at one of the leading music conservatoires in the World: The Royal College Of Music in London, where I gained a music degree and was awarded the David Mason Trumpet prize (David Mason played The Beatles' Penny Lane Trumpet solo!). After graduating I freelanced in London with the English National Opera, BBC Symphony Orchestra and London Philharmonic Orchestra amongst others, before moving away from that scene but working as a full time Trumpeter.My point with all this is to assure you, I have the skill, expertise, contacts, passion and experience to deliver this concert you deserve and want as Bond fans.If successful in achieving the target, I will give every inch of my heart and soul to putting on a performance that you will NEVER forget...but you will need to be there on that night. It will not be recorded...and I suspect (bearing in mind it has never happened until now) this may be the one opportunity to see the music from that film performed in concert. The venue is lined up and very excited about the idea - I just need the backing from you now to confirm it and start the preparation for it.It would be held at The Wycombe Swan (in High Wycombe, Berkshire) which holds over 1,000. The date of the concert would be Saturday 26th January 2019.Venue Details: https://wycombeswan.co.uk/Online/Please note: please do not make any travel or accommodation arrangements before funding is successful.If funding IS successful, you will then be allocated your seat in the area you purchase with your backing pledge, or if you wish (for a small fee of £10) you can select your seat. I'm happy to try to work with you waive that fee if there is some flexibility in exactly the seat you want..I'm just trying to avoid 100 people demanding the same 2 seats!If you are purchasing more than one ticket, please purchase them separately, and email us on thelondonshowband@hotmail.com to let us know which people to put together.If we do not hit the target by the date stated (May 6th) any backers will be automatically refunded and the project will not go ahead.So what are we waiting for? Let's get this show on the road. Most importantly, I cannot allocate a budget to advertising this. It is down to you - the Bond fans - to share this, and encourage your friends to pledge and come and see it. Due to the planning needed and the Indiegogo limitations, we now have 60 days to hit the target - a pretty huge target!Just like the Moonraker knows, his dream may come true someday....

story:
What is Riffer?

Like Airbnb, Riffer is an online marketplace that, instead of providing lodging options, makes it simple to find the perfect musician to perform at your next event, with no membership costs. www.riffermusic.com is open to anyone planning an event that is in need of a musical performer.

 

 

What's our motivation?

Organizing a concert is always stressful regardless of the size of the event. Despite the importance of music to life, musical bands and promoters often find it difficult to connect to each other. Normally event organizers (these can be bar owners or just a normal people) have to spend several hours finding the right artist. This is because they have to deal with the following problems:

  • Artist availability (must match with the event date)
  • Artist price (must match with the event budget)
  • Knowing the actual talent of the artist
  • Having security that the artist will show up

 

These points take time to check by making calls, sending emails, and waiting for replies. As a result, in 90% of the cases, the same people are called because networks have been built where everyone knows each other. So, the event is basically organized exclusively because of interpersonal relationships. Artists face similar problems. They have no security of payment, even after the concert is over. And the date of the event itself could even be canceled.

 

  

Why is Riffer going to start a Music Revolution

Riffer is going to transform the way musicians are booked. No longer do event mangers and artists have to go through so much stress to organize an event as we offer additional exciting features on our platform including:

  • Fast booking and transaction service
  • Search features by location or music genre
  • Review system
  • Cancellation policy
  • Secure and trusted payment system    
  • Free streaming services on all social media platforms during an event
  • Opportunity for fans to share their musical experiences
  • Royalty fee payments through Soundreef
  • Free nights or discounts for artists on tour

 

What we do

Our primary goal is to ensure that invisibility between promoters and bands is no longer an issue. Synergy between the two only gets better when onboarding to Riffer Music. They can find each other more easily, be it by genre of music or by location. Issues of secure transactions have been solved as we offer a secure payment system. We equally offer our clients an opportunity to pay royalty fees through Soundreef, a benefit that cannot be found elsewhere. Bookings can be made super-fast and come with a cancelation policy.

Additionally, during organized events, artists, promoters, and fans can stream live on all social media platforms. And we have plans to make accommodation for one night in a hostel free for bands. Promotion just got easier as fans are able to share their awesome musical experiences during concerts with the bands after the events. All of this can, in turn, be shared on all our social media platforms including Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. Interestingly, Riffer Music is a membership free platform for all. Now, with Riffer Music, artists and promoters can put all their eggs in one basket without any hassle. 

  

Travel

Being a musician requires travel, not matter how stressful that may become. But what if Riffer Music could do its part to reduce the hassle? The creators of Riffer have partnerships with hostels around the world and are able to provide traveling musicians a free night!

 

 

Streaming Service

Riffer Music provides live streaming options to any social sites, giving talent seekers the ability to truly experience a performance before booking, and artists the ability to promote themselves in the most transparent way possible.

 

 

Project Stage

The platform is already in the development stage with a team of developers. This week we will finish installing the theme on our Magento based platform. In the meantime, you can visit the project website www.riffermusic.com 

!!!!! LAUNCHING DATE 03/2019 !!!!!

 

We need your HELP!

 

Why do we need your help? It’s easy. I experienced issues when booking artists first hand and came up with an innovative idea.I am building this platform with my personal funds and have even asked for a bank loan to achieve it. My personal funds are not enough to complete the project, so I’m asking all those who think that music is vital to life to DONATE!

The sum requested is needed for:

  • Completion of the theme configuration
  • Set up of the payment gateway
  • Set up of the streaming service
  • Modification of the platform to be user friendly
  • Testing
  • Running a marketing campaign

 

Do you like our idea and want to be an official SPONSOR? Write us at info@riffermusic.com

 

 

"ORGANIZING A CONCERT HAS NEVER BEEN SO EASY" 

 

PRESS RELEASE

Artwave.it - Prunderground - Communitydailynews - Indiepulsemusic - Fox40 - Ondatv - Nbc29 - Report-age

 

 

Charity

“Giving is not just about making a donation; it is about making a difference” (Kathy Calvin).

Riffer Music believes in making a difference in the music world. The creators of Riffer Music are currently looking for investor support while striving to support others on a mission to make a difference:  www.musiciansoncall.org, www.seashepherd.org, www.playingforchange.org.

story:
My name is Sarah Stephens!

 

Howdy, folks!

My name is Sarah Stephens. I am songwriter based out of a small town on Sand Mountain, Alabama southeast of Huntsville. I love it here. I am professionally trained as a lawyer, interesting choice, right? Well, I started writing music at age 15, but then I was led in the direction of higher education for a long time. I practiced law for 3 years, and I could not find myself more unhappy in a career. 

Music has and always will be my passion - songwriting in particular. If you have checked me out, you know I don't have mad vocal skills or guitar plucking abilities (wait until you see the clawhammer banjo, though)! I also play the mandolin.

I am launching my career in songwriting in my late twenties. I am married to the most wonderful man in the world, and you may have some legitimate questions as to why I need help launching this career with a background in practicing law. Well, to be honest, this is a huge financial endeavor, and there are a lot of upfront costs which I want to break down for you below:

  • Marketing and Business Coach
  • Voice Coach (Because people will still need to WANT to hear my music even if it is good, it needs to sound good)
  • Instrument Coaches (we all could use a little help)

The Impact

Your contribution will allow me to fund my lifelong dream of being a songwriter. I've had this dream since I was fifteen years old, but fear kept me out of pursuing it. Well, here I am at almost 30, and I am finally taking the plunge. It will take a while before I start making any money or gaining any traction, but with supporters like you, that timetable can be greatly reduced with the right tools. Your contribution can provide me with those tools, as listed above.

Risks & Challenges

I'm an open book. My story contains a LOT of hurdles - ask away. I'll give you my cell, and we can chat about what makes me qualified to pursue such a daunting, scary, and turbulent career. I am resilient. I am creative. I thrive in difficulties. I find my creative abilities in storms. Let's do this together.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, please know that I still love you no matter what! There are other ways you can help such as:

  • sharing my music on Facebook
  • sharing my official Youtube videos
  • talking about my music
  • tuning into my live sessions
  • just spreading the "Sarah Stephens Story" out in the world!

story:
Hey everyone! Thank you so much for being interested in this project. I’ve been working hard with my director and we have come up with a pretty amazing concept for my song This Time that I released last year. I know the song has already impacted many of the people that have listen to it and I have loved the feedback! I know that the song plus this music video will be that much more impactful! 
For this music video, we have everything planned out and the direction on lockdown. We would love to partner with you in funding  to cover crew costs, food and some other production expenses. We are working with a small crew and minimal production items, but we are confident that we can make an amazing music video with the talent that we have! Any money you give would be a great asset and I’d be forever grateful for you! If you would like to know more about the song in the message or the project in general, feel free to reach out to me if you have my number or on social media.

 

Thank you for believing in me and my

story:
Hi Guys! 

 

We are Highway Hunters a rock power trio based in Montreal, Canada. We have a unique formation of a distorted Hammond Organ, bass, drums and vocals. We play the kind of rock Halestorm and Deep Purple would've created together.

After releasing our first full album in April, we are ready to bring to the world a new Highway Hunters signature music video with the amazing video director Jean-Philippe Angers. This new video will present our single ''Down the River'' under new lights and colors.

This is where we need you! As much as passionate about our vision we are, this process takes a lots of work, time and money to create.

Your contribution will go to paying rental equipment, the crew members, the food for the crew, plane tickets and the promotion to release the new video to the world.

Perks you can receive for donating include physical album, private access to the video, t-shirt, private shows, Q&A Handwritten Lyrics and more.

Thank you again for your support and I hope you will contribute to keep the rock alive!

If you're unable to contribute monetarily at this time, please share our Indiegogo campaign, website and album with your friends and family and on your social media. All the love helps!

Rock'n'roll!

www.highwayhunters.com
www.facebook.com/highwayhuntersmusic
www.instagram.com/highwayhuntersmusic
www.twitter.com/highwayhunters3
www.youtube.com/highwayhunters

************************************************

Salut Gang!

 

Nous sommes Highway Hunters, un trio rock vintage basé à Montréal, Canada. Notre formation hors du commun est formé d'un orgue Hammond distortionné, d'une basse, d'un drum et de vocals. Notre style se promène entre Halestorm et Deep Purple.

En avril dernier nous avons sortie notre tout premier album complet et sommes présentement en train de travailler sur notre tout nouveau vidéoclip. Il sera signé Jean-Philippe Angers à la direction et création video et mettera en vedette notre single Down the River. 

C'est donc ici que nous avons besoins de vous!!! Malgré toute la passion inébranlable que nous avons face à notre vision pour Highway Hunters, le développement d'un nouveau vidéo demande beaucoup de travail, de temps et d'argent. Votre contribution ira directement au soutien pour la location d'équipement vidéo, payer l'équipe de tournage, la nourriture lors du tournage, l'hébergement, les billets d'avion ainsi que la promotion pour lancer le nouveau videoclip dans le monde! 

Nous offrons plusieurs forfaits pour satisfaire tous nos fans incluant des options tel que un album physique, t-shirt, des shows privés, des paroles écrites, accès privé au video avant la date officielle, des Q&A et plus encore. 

Merci encore pour tout le support que vous nous donnez. Absolument tout est très apprécié. Si vous n'êtes pas en mesure de contribuer monétairement, vous pouvez partager notre campagne Indiegogo, site web, album et videos avec vos amis, famille et sur vos médias sociaux. Chaque partage fait une différence! 

Rock'n'roll!

www.highwayhunters.com
www.facebook.com/highwayhuntersmusic
www.instagram.com/highwayhuntersmusic
www.twitter.com/highwayhunters3
www.youtube.com/highwayhunters

story:
You've told us you wish you could listen to Bring the War Home from the comfort of YOUR Home. The video from our last show has almost 60 views so that speaks for itself. We listened.

And maybe the crappy outdoor recording of In Back of Grossifer's isn't quite hitting the spot.

Well, now you can with the hottest new EP you probably didn't ask for: Bring the War Home's self-titled debut EP!

God bless the market.

Speaking of, we want your money up front. They call it "crowdfunding" and it's great because we get your money up front. Depending on how much of your money we get, we might even give you extra shit! Think of it like pre-ordering, but with benefits.

How'd you get so lucky?!

story:
The Desire

In deciding to contribute to me, and my campaign, I hope you feel the passion that I have for helping people. I do know that Charity begins at home, and then spreads abroad. So, I must first make sure, my household is secure, and my bills are paid and I have transportation to and fro. I have given to others over the years and then realize I forgot to take care of my bills. Therefore, I'm positioning myself to get some for me, and some for my family, and then some for others.

  • The Organization's Website is FLOWMillionDollar.com.
  • My profile is on the "Meet the Organizer" page
  • I wrote a Musical Drama in 1996, and I need to Produce it, and raise funds
  • I am the Producer and Host of the Internet TV Show, Wednesday's Woman, Live on Wednesday's, 10:30am (PST) on RMConAir.com
  • I also act as a Creative Content Producer for other shows on the RMC Network

I'm 54 years of age. Married, with 5 Children, and 2 Grands. I'm a church Musician and Praise and Worship Leader, for two churches. I have a desire and a personal need, to take my show on the road. At my age, I have to work smart and be wise, while I have enough voice, and energy, to make a few million. (smiles) I'm launching an LLC, which will cover the Music Production, Television Production, Performing Arts Workshops, and Business Management, that will be serving all of my business endeavors. I currently work, as the Assistant Manager of Roscoe's Media Center and the Personal Assistant, to Johnny Morris, General Manager of Roscoe's Media Center, and Roscoe's TV, in Los Angeles, CA. (RMConAir and RMCGospel.com)

$5500.00 Is What I Need, And this Is What You Get: Tickets, T-Shirts, CD's DVDs, Advertising Sponsorship, a Goody Bag...

After conferring with my Business Consultant, $5500.00 is what I Need to launch "Singing For Charity" Musical Drama.

  • For Business Management: Filing The LLC., Opening the Account, Printing, Cost of the Venue = $1800.00
  • Music Production: 3-Musicians (4 Rehearsals & the Show) Sound Tech, Pressing of 100 CD's = $1500.00
  • Television Production: (Internet & Cable) 2-Cameras, Lights, Editing, Pressing of 100 DVDs, Production Manager = $1200.00
  • Performing Arts Workshops: Vocal, Dance, Drama = $1000.00
  • Our Perks will include: a Ticket to Attend, or a Link to Watch the Show Live; a T-Shirt, a CD, a DVD, and a Goody Bag.
  • Once June, 17th hits, and the clock strikes, all that we raise will be in. Based on what we have, we may have to skim off a few bills, and adjust our overall production, however, the show will go on!
  • I hope to make at least $5,000 in Tickets and Advertising sales, as well as the Cd, DVD and T-Shirt sales. I also plan to get Bookings for the Show, to build enough funds, to finance the Family Love Outreach Organization.

The Impact I Believe, Will Be World Changing

Since my work at RMC encompasses networking with over 30 show Producers per week, and their guests. I have been introduced to people from South Africa, West Africa and Jamaica. And then there are the people who live here in America that are Rappers, Actors and Sports Figures. To name a few, Mike Tyson, DJ Quick and Howard Hewitt. (Wow)

  • As a Contributor to my project, I believe you will feel a sense of belonging. I wrote a song that says, Everybody Needs a Place to Call Home... Family is what I find is missing in the world today, and not to mention the loss of Love... I feel  all I do, and all that I am, is built, and based upon Love, and the Unity of Family, which also, happens to be the name of my Organization, since 2003, Family Love Outreach Workshop (FLOW)
  • I once had a couple of websites built, Family Love Outreach.org, and FLOW 50 Project.com, which I had no control over, and now they are no longer in existence. However, everything is being placed on a new site, FLOWMillionDollarMarch.com, in which I have built, and have control over.

Taking Risks Is Inevitable; I Say It's A Challenge of Faith, Hope and Charity (LOVE)

If I were to give some advice to any one seeking to reach their dreams and goals, I would say, handle as much of your own business and possible. Trust no one, not even yourself. All Faith, Perfect Peace, Self-Determination, Sharing and Caring! It's a Formula that when followed, brings good outcomes.

  • I was told by my Adopted Mother when I was around 9 years old that I needed psychiatric treatment... What The... Well, today some 44 years later, I've been called Crazy by a lot of my family and friends. Why? Because I move to my own beat, I sing and play my own music, I bake and eat my own cake... meaning I do things my way. I hear what they can't hear, I see what they can't see, I go where they can't go, and I do what they don't do. Why? I've been gifted with special abilities call creative energy mixed with Love and Compassion for All-Mankind, therefore, I have many close encounters with other kinds. Talk about staying prayed up! 24/7, spiritually suited to handle anything, any where and any time. 
  • That's why I'm Singing For Charity, because I feel I have been chosen, by the Most High, to do what I do, for the betterment of man-kind. Someone has to show what Love Looks Like, Feels Like, and Acts Like, so here I go, Singing for Charity, Dancing for Charity, Acting for Charity and Loving every bit of it!

You Can Help Me. I Realize I Need Help!

In Order For This To Really Go Worldwide, I Need people, telling people, to tell people, to check out this 6'3" Woman, on the Internet Singing, Dancing and Acting her heart out for Charity.

  • I plan to make this Campaign a success. Since I have a few dollars to spend, I'm getting fliers, and posters printed and distributed, and I'm going to purchase some E blasts, and make sure I inform some older people I know, who are retired and living large... (smiles)
  • Also, Indiegogo wants us to use the social media tools they have provided, which I think is great, because they have a built in audience and the more people connect, the larger the audience becomes, so it becomes a win win situation.

And There It Is Ladies and Gentlemen; The Life of Lady Crystal Davis-Wells, Wednesday's Woman, on RMConAir.com, the Organizer of FLOWMillionDollarMarch.com, and the Writer of Singing for Charity Musical Drama!

story:
My name is Andrea Nicole and I am an artist/songwriter from a small town in Kentucky. This campaign is so important due to the fact that I want to be a storyteller that relates to people and their every day problems, joys, struggles, and successes. Music has always been therapy to me and contributing to my fans' well-being is my purpose in this world. The world of music provides an escape from reality and at the same time provides people with the feeling that they aren't alone out there. Creating an album of any kind requires money. That's a simple fact that no one can argue. From the studio time itself, to musicians' time, to the reproduction of the actual album at the finish of the process, the money contributed to this campaign will help me live out one of my lifelong dreams and hopefully help others that purchase and follow my music. I live to have fun such as the time described in my song, "Bourbon Breakdown". Who doesn't love to let go of their worries and let loose?!!! There are also the realities of failed relationships which is something that is focused on in my original titled, "The Door". I'm a realistic person who is very in touch with my feelings and every song I write can relate to someone. I work hard when I sit down in a writing session to not only have a great hook that is catchy, but compose lyrics that not only make sense but can provoke feelings and connect to my demographic. I have proof that this has been successful because I was fortunate enough to open up for the band Blackhawk and was able to perform two of my originals for a crowd of a few hundred people. Not only were they pleased, but I had so many that made specific comments letting me know the job had been accomplished. They got it and they very much bought the things I tried to say in song. There are so many obstacles in the music world...especially as a female. At the same time, with my personality and perseverance I am more than capable of overcoming them. I treat people like people want to be treated. In fact, that is what my song, "Small Town in Me" is about. I have made so many fans in the past few years sharing music and can't wait to continue to make more. The fans are the most important thing to me and always will be. It would mean so much in your contributions if you could also share this with others and open them up to the world of Andrea Nicole. It takes a huge team and I want my music to spread as far as it possibly can. I have stories to tell and the more that hear the better. There are tools on here that will allow you to easily share and I ask that you please do so. Thanks so much for you time y'all and welcome to this amazing ride that you're embarking on with me!!!!

Love, 

Andrea Nicole

story:
YCTD IS REBORN

AFTER THE LONG WAIT, YCTD IS BACK AND WITH MORE TO OFFER THAN EVER!

We are excited and proud to bring our newest release 'Ex Nihilo' to you this spring.  It is our first work featuring new band members Ron Dalton on guitar, and Som Pluijmers on vocals with Missi.  We know this album will be all our fans have waited for and hope to bring new fans into the YCTD family.

We are also happy to announce a busy touring season coming your way very soon.  Hence our need for new transportation.  Being on the road can be long and grueling and we are needing reliable transportation to get us to your hometown.  The van needs to be large enough to sleep in and we have found several options which meet our needs.  Unfortunately, financing is not an option, so we are reaching our to our friends, fans and family for any donations that can be made towards the cost of the van.

We are offering some amazing, limited edition perks for donations so be sure to check out our gifts to you for supporting us.  If just 400 of our almost 30,000 fans on facebook donated $50,we would be at our goal instantly!! 

If you have $5 or $500 to give, we are so thankful for all of you.  If you cannot give right now, the fundraiser will be active for 60 days!  

Please also take a moment to help us spread the word!  Share the page on your personal, band and business pages; facebook, Instagram, twitter and the like!

We will post new videos every week of a band member speaking on YCTD and how the fundraiser is going so continue to check in for news and updates!

Again, thank all of you for your support and we hope to see each and every one of you in your town this year!!

story:
Bella Cat has been working on her new album for a little over 2 years . Her 1st Album came out of Nashville. Her next album out of Chicago is recorded with some of the best musicians in the world. We wanted to deliver the best possible soul album. Clyde Stubblefield (James Browns Drummer) believed in this lil fire cracker from the small town of Chelsea Quebec and so should you, just go online and listen to her music videos & live performances for yourself! We want to use this money to Master the Cd with Ottawa's Producer Dean Watson, create physical copies, & produce merchandise. We are not asking for donations we are simple asking you to pre - order the cd ! So if you do donate you will receive an album or gift depending on which package or perk you've decided on ! We appreciate you helping this soul artist accomplish her dreams !
 
We spent 10 000 dollars making this CD in Chicago, Milwaukee and Canada about two years ago we did an indie gogo campaign for marketing ! We wanted to say thanks again because it helped soOo much, her face is becoming more known because of her devoted fans! Now we want to share with you her music and create physical copies for the world !
   The Reason we want people to hear this CD so bad not only because Bella has pored her heart and soul into it but because it is an extreamly rare mix of incredible artists from across the world.
Bella talks about it in her video ! 
 

If you love this campaign but can't purchase a perk, you can help by liking or following anyone of Bella Cat's Social Media sights. Thank You

story: We want to start our career off strong and with your help we can have an impactful debut, merchandise for fans, and it'll just take some stress off of us. Any amount helps and we appreciate every consideration.
